entries.name: Shadow's Greaves
entries.flavorText: "…The future can't be fought. I know it. You know it. But that won't stop you from trying."  —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Greaves of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be immovable.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Bond
entries.flavorText: "Had a face like the end-times and eyes like manna in the desert. One look at him, and I knew I wasn't gonna be saved." —The Drifter

entries.name: Greaves of Ascendancy
entries.flavorText: "I know where I stand." —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Edge of Intent
entries.flavorText: An echo of an ancient weapon, forged from a memory of cunning.

entries.name: Mark of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be feared.

entries.name: Shadow's Strides
entries.flavorText: "All that we've left in the athenaeum catalogs are suitable proxies for all the powers of this system. I've simply forgotten how to reach them. I'm not who I was. I need you." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Prometheus Lens
entries.flavorText: "Cryptarchs made a crystal that starts fires? Get me one. I don't care how you do it. Go!" —Cayde-6

entries.name: Bond of Remembrance
entries.flavorText: To sharpen our senses when we return.

entries.name: Mark of Shelter
entries.flavorText: Titans are both the shelter and the storm.

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Tunic
entries.flavorText: III - You are hollowed.

entries.name: Lightkin Mask
entries.flavorText: "A Sacred Splicer can change much, but I never dreamed our lives would change so quickly." —Mithrax

entries.name: Boots of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: You're a difficult one to find.

entries.name: Boots of the Ace-Defiant
entries.flavorText: “We armed the Sindu with a fleet of golden ships. Their interceptors are a shield for the Leviathan, as the Shadows are my sword.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Temptation's Hook
entries.flavorText: A finger of death from which to hang.

entries.name: Opulent Scholar Gloves
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the work that will bring this system together. I'll need your wisdom." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Osteo Striga
entries.flavorText: "Victory is not in the unmaking of an enemy, but in the re-making of an enemy into your blade." —9th Understanding, 7th Revision of Sorrow

entries.name: THE SWARM
entries.flavorText: Hunger is the all of it, and it is all of hunger.

entries.name: Pyrrhic Ascent Mark
entries.flavorText: "No matter how strong you are, there will always be a weight too heavy to carry alone." —Reed-7, Exo Titan

entries.name: Praefectus Strides
entries.flavorText: "Ghaul commanded you to die for his vanity. I ask only that you fight at my side for the empire. The choice is yours." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Gloves of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be lethal.

entries.name: Filigree of Light
entries.flavorText: "Light is both delicate and unbreakable."—Ikora Rey

entries.name: Candescent Plate
entries.flavorText: Upgrade this item using Kindling and Embers obtained during Solstice 2022.

entries.name: Opulent Scholar Bond
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the end of all things. The novenary, the Awoken Queen, the sad, strange little man on his rickety boat. They believe they've seen the same. What they don't know will destroy them." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Kairos Function Mask
entries.flavorText: "Future War Cult has an artifact they call 'The Device' which may be Vex in origin." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Boots of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: It's all for the sake of appearances.

entries.name: Boots of the Fulminator
entries.flavorText: “What was she? A creature of the Light? Or the other end of the spectrum? The Councilors never finished their analysis.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Gauntlets of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be indestructible.

entries.name: Ophidian Aspect
entries.flavorText: "Have I the aspic in my lips?"

entries.name: Edge of Concurrence
entries.flavorText: An echo of an ancient weapon, forged from a memory of ambition.

entries.name: Boots of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "The Clipse worship guns. That's why Rull and I have an understanding. Even if he's not bright." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Gloves
entries.flavorText: "Wilhelmina's more like me than she admits. Immortality at any cost. Even family." —Clovis Bray I

entries.name: Mechabre
entries.flavorText: The killer robot killer.

entries.name: Opulent Stalker Vest
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen what must fall so the Empire may rise. Your mastery of silent slaughter shall make true Cabal of us all." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Bond of Reciprocity
entries.flavorText: "In the darkness, light shines more brightly, and where light shines, it casts a shadow." —Ulan-Tan

entries.name: Binary Phoenix Cloak
entries.flavorText: The phoenix that fights itself, then rises from its ashes stronger than ever. That is the Crucible.

entries.name: Gauntlets of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "Do I miss my arm? I miss my empire. I would give everything to have it back. And I will." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: Noble Constant Mark
entries.flavorText: Where you stand, they will fall.

entries.name: Equitis Shade Boots
entries.flavorText: "There has only been a single Shadow from each people I've encountered. Yet there are so many Lights, and I have so little time…" —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal.

entries.name: Ketchkiller's Vest
entries.flavorText: "Make sure any flag you fight under is worth dying for." —Spider

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Gloves
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes the difference between survival and eradication is just pure, simple stubbornness." —The Drifter

entries.name: Ego and Squid
entries.flavorText: Pahanin was a Hunter, satirist, travel writer, and renowned cephalopod enthusiast.

entries.name: Illicit Reaper Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Outlawed Reaper Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Notorious Reaper Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Helm
entries.flavorText: "I've learned not to be ashamed of the fear. It's to be expected, given what we are." —Pavel Nolg

entries.name: Helm of Saint-14
entries.flavorText: "He walked out into the demon light. But at the end he was brighter." —Paean to Saint-14

entries.name: Riiswalker
entries.flavorText: "No. I will not allow a Fallen to fight in the Banner, that right is reserved for Guardians alone. But if you insist, I may allow a Guardian to carry a Fallen-forged weapon into battle. You are a weaponsmith, are you not?" —Lord Saladin to an Unknown Eliksni

entries.name: Solstice Cloak (Scorched)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Payback Redux mission, get Super kills in the Crucible, and complete patrols.

entries.name: Contender's Shell
entries.flavorText: "Nothing pleases me more than to see you fight." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Gloves
entries.flavorText: "Bonds are forged on the battlefield and broken at the War Table." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Wing Theorem
entries.flavorText: The double-headed phoenix that fights itself represents Guardians who strengthen each other in the Crucible.

entries.name: Pyrrhic Ascent Strides
entries.flavorText: "There is nowhere to run." —Aisha, Human Hunter

entries.name: Geomag Stabilizers
entries.flavorText: "The hurricane will overtake you. It's inevitable. Take stability where you can get it." —Ikora Rey

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Vestments
entries.flavorText: "Jumpship logs indicate she visited Venus, the Moon, the Reef, and several locations on Earth. Her last position before surrendering herself was Mars." —Vanguard Security Report Excerpt

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Grips
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes the difference between survival and eradication is just pure, simple stubbornness." —The Drifter

entries.name: Gensym Knight Bond
entries.flavorText: "Remember, the universe is a chaotic system. This frippery won't protect you from the continuum." —Asher Mir

entries.name: Ketchkiller's Plate
entries.flavorText: "You will face cutlass and cannon fire… nothing you need fear." —Mithrax

entries.name: Unfocused Solar Energy
entries.flavorText: Speak with Ikora Rey in the Tower to unlock this power.

entries.name: Mk. 44 Stand Asides
entries.flavorText: Pardon me. Coming through.

entries.name: Transversive Steps
entries.flavorText: Your relationship with consistent spacetime is...tenuous at best.

entries.name: Celestine Hood (Majestic)
entries.flavorText:
During Solstice 2021:
- Defeat 5 minibosses in the European Aerial Zone before the boss is summoned.
- Collect Elemental Orbs.
- Rapidly defeat combatants.

entries.name: Infiltrator Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who trespass.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Vest
entries.flavorText: "Found a hallway, full of statues of Calus in various states of dissection. Sobbing noise coming from the walls."  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 3rd Transmission

entries.name: Phobos Warden Grasps
entries.flavorText: "Stay strong. Be brave." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Vest of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be daring.

entries.name: Khepri's Sting
entries.flavorText: The wound is not deep, but you know it exists—and that is enough.

entries.name: Kairos Function Crown
entries.flavorText: "Future War Cult has an artifact they call 'The Device' which may be Vex in origin." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Gloves
entries.flavorText: "For starlight was my mother, and my father was the dark." —Queen Mara Sov

entries.name: Luna's Howl
entries.flavorText: "Guardians never die. But we don't forget those who do." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Not Forgotten
entries.flavorText: "Guardians never die. But we don't forget those who do." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Illicit Sentry Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you defend him, Hunter?

entries.name: Outlawed Sentry Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you defend him, Hunter?

entries.name: Notorious Sentry Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you defend him, Hunter?

entries.name: Mark Relentless
entries.flavorText: "For you as much as it is for them. They seek to observe your absolute force." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Mark Judgment
entries.flavorText: "A signifier of force." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Kairos Function Vest
entries.flavorText: "Multiple analyses confirm: the milky radiolarian fluid found in Vex chassis is organic in nature." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Mask of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "Five Lights. Too many to fight. I loosed web grenades and fled." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: Machina Dei 4
entries.flavorText:
A charnel but effulgent orb—beacon in a loathsome dark—
Fêted, fetid corpses rise—a too-long-absent gibbous spark.

entries.name: Infinite Paths 8
entries.flavorText:
They sowed the First, now reap the Last; forever narrows to a line
Where Light will fade into the past—when all's converted, nothing shines.

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Strides
entries.flavorText: "We're notifying fireteam members and life partners as we identify the Ghost remains. It's going to take a while."  —Vanguard Security Report Excerpt

entries.name: Opulent Scholar Hood
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the victories that your wisdom shall win in my name. Over and over." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Gloves
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We were forged in the fires of a burning world." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Insigne Shade Gloves
entries.flavorText: "Warrior-scholars. Reality breakers. Weapons of mass destruction. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: The Long Walk
entries.flavorText: "There is an end to everything." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Scatterhorn Bond
entries.flavorText: "Lost things have a way of washing up on the Tangled Shore." —The Spider

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Hood
entries.flavorText: "I've learned not to be ashamed of the fear. It's to be expected, given what we are." —Pavel Nolg

entries.name: Wing Discipline
entries.flavorText: The double-headed phoenix that fights itself represents Guardians who strengthen each other in the Crucible.

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "If this is a test, we shall not fail." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Boots
entries.flavorText: "What has been awoken can slumber no more." —Techeun Kalli

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Plate
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes it's a cosmic event. Sometimes it's a beast from hell. Sometimes it's one man." —The Drifter

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Greaves
entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.name: Redrix's Claymore
entries.flavorText: "On the ladder and in the fight, momentum is the answer."

entries.name: St0mp-EE5
entries.flavorText: "I call them the Stompies! For when your legs need that extra kick." —Marcus Ren

entries.name: Lucky Pants
entries.flavorText: "What? No, I didn't illegally mod the holster. These are just really lucky pants!" —Cayde-6

entries.name: Orpheus Rig
entries.flavorText: Never, ever, look back.

entries.name: Grips of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be precise.

entries.name: Pyrrhic Ascent Grasps
entries.flavorText: "I could have done more. Should have done more." —Aisha, Human Hunter

entries.name: An Insurmountable Skullfort
entries.flavorText: BRAINVAULT Sigma-ACTIUM-IX Cranial Dreadnought (Invincible Type)

entries.name: Wild Hunt Boots
entries.flavorText: Tread softly.

entries.name: BrayTech Researcher's Hood
entries.flavorText: Featuring the latest in autocorrecting lens technology.

entries.name: Malfeasance
entries.flavorText: "Nothing kills a Guardian faster than another Guardian." —The Drifter

entries.name: Vest of Transcendence
entries.flavorText: "If you do this, it can't be undone. Some choices change you. This is one of them." —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Opulent Stalker Cloak
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the end of all things. The novenary, the Awoken Queen, the sad, strange little man on his rickety boat. They believe they've seen the same. What they don't know shall destroy them." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Whispering Slab
entries.flavorText: It sings of sorrows that have not yet come to pass.

entries.name: The Deicide
entries.flavorText: "Believe in war, and nothing else." —Lakshmi-2

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Veil
entries.flavorText: I - You are seen.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Grasps
entries.flavorText: "That's no ordinary dust. You're standing on the pulverized remnants of 1 Ceres." —Corsair Anzani Lyle

entries.name: The Manticore
entries.flavorText: Let fly my sting.

entries.name: Solstice Vest (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete the "Leviathan" raid on Prestige difficulty.

entries.name: Medal Mantle
entries.flavorText: Your reputation precedes you, like a disregarded warning.

entries.name: Insigne Shade Bond
entries.flavorText: "This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. And they should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Mask
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Solstice Bond (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Defeat Bosses

entries.name: Illicit Reaper Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Titan?

entries.name: Outlawed Reaper Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Titan?

entries.name: Notorious Reaper Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Titan?

entries.name: Solstice Boots (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Reach "Legend" Crucible Rank.

entries.name: Promethium Spur
entries.flavorText: Pass the torch. Spread the fire.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Grasps
entries.flavorText: "That's no ordinary dust. You're standing on the pulverized remnants of 1 Ceres." —Corsair Anzani Lyle

entries.name: Wild Hunt Strides
entries.flavorText: Move in silence.

entries.name: Cloak Relentless
entries.flavorText: "For you as much as for them. They are observing your swiftness."  —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Cloak Judgment
entries.flavorText: "For one who fights as the wind flows." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Bond of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "I never forgot what I saw—the gift the Great Machine could bestow. And Calus promised me more." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: Doom Fang Pauldron
entries.flavorText: Nobody calls it that.

entries.name: Synthoceps
entries.flavorText: Caution: the organism has been known to develop consciousness. In these cases, immediate termination is recommended.

entries.name: Solstice Mark (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Homecoming Redux mission, defeat enemies with Arc Power weapons, and defeat enemies.

entries.name: Solstice Greaves (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Reach "Legend" Crucible Rank.

entries.name: Wild Hunt Hood
entries.flavorText: Listen to the wind blow.

entries.name: Mask of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "I can solve this. Give me a weapon." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer at the Battle of Kaga-Clipse

entries.name: Nezarec's Whisper
entries.flavorText: "Rise, Disciple, and bear this gift with pride." —Rhulk, Disciple of the Witness

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Pants
entries.flavorText: IV - You are led.

entries.name: Shadow's Grips
entries.flavorText: "With my knowledge of the future and all that you've seen and done… The silence borne of it… What can stop us at the end of all things?" —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Resonant Fury Bond
entries.flavorText: I reach for nothing. I am subdued. I shall remain useless.

entries.name: Greaves of Ascendancy
entries.flavorText: "I know where I stand." —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Exile's Curse (Adept)
entries.flavorText: It's a blessing in disguise.

entries.name: Temptation's Mark
entries.flavorText: "If this is wrong, I don't want to be right." —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Solstice Boots (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Reach "Legend" Crucible Rank.

entries.name: Greaves of the Emperor's Champion
entries.flavorText: The chorus of regret must be deafening.

entries.name: Greaves of Rull
entries.flavorText: “Valus Nohr marched on our capital with a few thousand. For weeks we battered them. But the Valus. She broke us.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.

entries.name: Lost Pacific Cape
entries.flavorText: Sloane had these Golden Age space suits repurposed for Guardian armor.

entries.name: Sails of Osiris
entries.flavorText: "When eyes are clear, justice need not be blind." —Fractal Scrolls

entries.name: Saint-14's Gray Pigeon
entries.flavorText: "The name? Pigeons are the only birds left in the City sky. One of the many 'last things' we fight for. If you have a problem with that, we could step into the Crucible." —Saint-14

entries.name: Kabr's Glass Aegis
entries.flavorText: Kabr stopped them in the Vault of Glass, but what did he start?

entries.name: Asher Mir's One-Way Ticket
entries.flavorText: "It is possible to mathematically predict the cadence of death and resurrection in every firefight, regardless of combatant composition." —Asher Mir

entries.name: Ikora's Resolve
entries.flavorText: "I'd tell my younger self, 'There will be plenty of time to settle down. For now, enjoy the ride.'" —Ikora Rey

entries.name: The Sundaresh Experiment 13-R
entries.flavorText: Ishtar Collective research led to places unexpected, unexplored, and in some cases unsanctioned.

entries.name: No Love Lost
entries.flavorText: "I'll do it again, and again, for her." —Elsie Bray

entries.name: Nothing Manacles
entries.flavorText: The equations balance thus: you are diminished, and I am exalted. You are broken, and I am made strong.

entries.name: Ignition Code
entries.flavorText: "I can decode anything with a grenade launcher." —Saint-14

entries.name: Scatterhorn Vest
entries.flavorText: "Was Wolf once. Still Wolf after Scatter, but… different. Then Queen's. Wolf again. Bannerless. Then Spider's." —Avrok

entries.name: Opulent Stalker Mask
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the victories that your cunning shall win in my name. Over and over." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Shadow's Greaves
entries.flavorText: "…The future can't be fought. I know it. You know it. But that won't stop you from trying."  —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Survivor's Epitaph
entries.flavorText: "A weapon hides nothing. It is what it is. Whether it wants to be or not." —Saint-14 to Shaxx

entries.name: Shadow's Mark
entries.flavorText: “Calus could not heal our air. My planet is still dying. But as long as I serve, I have hope.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.

entries.name: Mark of the Emperor's Champion
entries.flavorText: A gift for the Titan with Ghaul's strength.

entries.name: Wild Hunt Vestment
entries.flavorText: "I've studied the enemies of the Light, and I don't know what lured us to that ruin in Old Chicago and killed all those Guardians. But, I know it was hunting us." —Shayura, Awoken Warlock

entries.name: Cerulean Flash
entries.flavorText: Some years, the Dawning comes faster than anyone expects.

entries.name: A History of Starlight
entries.flavorText: Before Tyra Karn settled in the Iron Temple, her second home was among the stars.

entries.name: Any Other Sky
entries.flavorText: "Future me will thank me." —Elsie Bray

entries.name: Eira's Grace
entries.flavorText: "She told me the dance was from before the Traveler, that it was done with loved ones, and only ever under a setting sun. I wasn't sure I believed her. But I wanted to." —Hawthorne

entries.name: Wildwood Cloak
entries.flavorText: Devrim Kay fashioned the pattern for these Guardian armor suits.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Grasps
entries.flavorText: "We've progressed into a liminal space. Corridors folding on each other. Psychometer is spiking here; are we sure this is safe?" —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 2nd Transmission

entries.name: Breakneck
entries.flavorText: "They don't make Dark Age tech like this anymore. Lucky for you I kept all mine." —The Drifter

entries.name: Shadow's Helm
entries.flavorText: "The mysteries of the universe lie before you. Unresolved. Threatening. You and I will face them together. As true Cabal." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Vest of the Ace-Defiant
entries.flavorText: “The Ace-Defiant burned his mind to fly my golden ship. Being a Loyalist costs you. Being a Shadow costs dearly.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Vest of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: You don't realize that I'm all around you.

entries.name: Shadow's Mask
entries.flavorText: "The athenaeum worlds lie before you. Everything from the Empire of old that was—and has been lost. You and I will rediscover them together. As true Cabal." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Wing Theorem
entries.flavorText: The double-headed phoenix that fights itself represents Guardians who strengthen each other in the Crucible.

entries.name: Waking Vigil
entries.flavorText: "We have a duty to this solar system that goes deeper than blood, deeper than oaths." —Paladin Devi Cassl

entries.name: Solstice Plate (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete the "Leviathan" raid on Prestige difficulty.

entries.name: Boots of the Fulminator
entries.flavorText: “What was she? A creature of the Light? Or the other end of the spectrum? The Councilors never finished their analysis.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Boots of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: It's all for the sake of appearances.

entries.name: Boots of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "The fiercest Light emerged from the tangle of the web grenade. The amethyst divider on his helmet gleamed with rage. I was gone by then. I'm no fool." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: Ace of Spades
entries.flavorText: "Folding was never an option." —Cayde-6

entries.name: Resonant Fury Helm
entries.flavorText: Ur yearns for nurture. It does so through hunger.

entries.name: Resonant Fury Greaves
entries.flavorText: Akka yearned for nurture. It did so through secrets.

entries.flavorText: "I respect what I cannot steal from and you cannot take from the dark." —Excerpt from an old Eliksni salvage manifest

entries.name: Wings of Sacred Dawn
entries.flavorText: There will come a day when the light will never fade.

entries.name: Delicate Tomb
entries.flavorText: The danger within is repulsive to us.

entries.name: Cloak of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "I can outshoot anybody. Even the Traveler-spawn. My mind's bigger, too." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer

entries.name: Kairos Function Wraps
entries.flavorText: "Vex structures on Venus and Mercury predate the Golden Age, and possibly Humanity itself." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Stark Baffler
entries.flavorText: Sleek and confounding.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Boots
entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter
