entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the work that will bring this system together. I'll need your strength." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Vita Brevis
entries.flavorText: Life is too short to waste on a slow ride.

entries.name: Outbreak Perfected
entries.flavorText: ~directive = KILL while enemies = PRESENT: execute(directive)~

entries.name: Pathfinder's Hood
entries.flavorText: A faithful companion to cover your flank.

entries.name: Solstice Gauntlets (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete strikes with at least one clanmate.

entries.name: Cowl of Righteousness
entries.flavorText: "You say this is for the greater good. Which good have you deemed lesser?" —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Vest of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: You don't realize that I'm all around you.

entries.name: Vest of the Ace-Defiant
entries.flavorText: “The Ace-Defiant burned his mind to fly my golden ship. Being a Loyalist costs you. Being a Shadow costs dearly.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Solstice Cloak (Majestic)
entries.flavorText: Complete patrols, collect Elemental Orbs of any type in the European Aerial Zone, and defeat bosses.

entries.name: Jack Queen King 3
entries.flavorText:
An army meets, and stands, and falls. Three nobles wage their hopeless war.
In shifting madness, evil crawls. One stands above the battle's roar.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Wraps
entries.flavorText: "That's no ordinary dust. You're standing on the pulverized remnants of 1 Ceres." —Corsair Anzani Lyle

entries.name: Praefectus Plate
entries.flavorText: "Many victories seem out of reach. But you march onward, step by step, wound after wound, until they are in your grasp." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Jötunn
entries.flavorText: "Untamed. Destructive. As forceful and chaotic as Ymir himself." —Ada-1

entries.name: The Dragon's Shadow
entries.flavorText: "It is my honor." —Chalco Yong to Ikora Rey

entries.name: Raiden Flux
entries.flavorText: Interfaces with synapses (or nearest equivalent) to draw electric power directly from the wearer's body.

entries.name: Lucky Raspberry
entries.flavorText:
> No one has ever died wearing me.
# It's true. She leaves the unworthy before they fall.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Mark
entries.flavorText: "Wasn't the exit this way?"  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition Log Final Transmission

entries.name: Cloak Relentless
entries.flavorText: "For you as much as for them. They are observing your swiftness."  —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Cloak Judgment
entries.flavorText: "For one who fights as the wind flows." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Chrysopelea-S
entries.flavorText: Out of the grass. Into the sky.

entries.name: The Prod
entries.flavorText: "It'll get you moving." —Tex 99-40

entries.name: Tachyon-4
entries.flavorText: Faster than the fastest.

entries.name: Saint's Invocation
entries.flavorText: "Find tranquility in the reprieve" —Saint-14

entries.name: Pathfinder's Helm
entries.flavorText: If the sky is falling, shelter those beneath you.

entries.name: The Palindrome
entries.flavorText: Draw, O Coward!

entries.name: Outlawed Collector Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Illicit Collector Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Notorious Collector Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Gensym Knight Mark
entries.flavorText: "Remember, the universe is a chaotic system. This frippery won't protect you from the continuum." —Asher Mir

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Had a face like the end-times and eyes like manna in the desert. One look at him, and I knew I wasn't gonna be saved." —The Drifter

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Plate
entries.flavorText: "I believed not that the Light was good, but that there is goodness in those who defend it. I still do." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Phobos Warden Strides
entries.flavorText: "We are deploying Guardians to all corners of the system." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Vambraces
entries.flavorText: Caught alone in a tangled web.

entries.name: Kairos Function Crown
entries.flavorText: "Future War Cult has an artifact they call 'The Device' which may be Vex in origin." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Helm of the Emperor's Champion
entries.flavorText: Looking for a quiet place to watch the end of the world.

entries.name: Mask of Rull
entries.flavorText: “My planet was dead. The sky poisoned by war with an extrasolar enemy in a war that continued to rage. Then Calus came.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse

entries.name: Crest of Alpha Lupi
entries.flavorText: Whoever survives our passing does so only by our consent.

entries.name: Actium War Rig
entries.flavorText: Conflict Resolution Solution #3479: Leave them to rest wherever they may fall.

entries.name: Hallowfire Heart
entries.flavorText: "You who seek the Forge: your journey will be long, but your destination is closer than you think." —Ouros

entries.name: The Tall Tale
entries.flavorText: "Every story is true if you tell it right." —Andal Brask

entries.name: Unfinal Shapes
entries.flavorText: "Mine is not a final shape. She showed me that." –Eris Morn

entries.name: Death to Kells
entries.flavorText: What is a Kell to a Spider?

entries.name: Aeviternal XXII
entries.flavorText: A remarkably preserved Golden Age pattern recovered from the excavation in Hellas Basin.

entries.name: Gyrfalcon's Hauberk
entries.flavorText: The higher your flight, the faster your dive.

entries.name: BrayTech Researcher's Bond
entries.flavorText: Keeping our greatest minds safe and warm.

entries.name: Sunstead Mark (Majestic)
entries.flavorText:
During Solstice 2021:
- Complete Glory Rank playlist activities, Nightfall strikes, or matches in Trials of Osiris.
- Collect Arc Elemental Orbs in the European Aerial Zone activity.
- Defeat powerful Hive.

entries.name: Binary Phoenix Mark
entries.flavorText: The phoenix that fights itself, then rises from its ashes stronger than ever. That is the Crucible.

entries.name: Pyrrhic Ascent Boots
entries.flavorText: "I walk without hesitation toward my destiny." —Shayura, Awoken Warlock

entries.name: Garden Progeny 1
entries.flavorText:
Two siblings cleaved by time and space, reflections never found alone,
The ending of the eldritch race—a path long seen but never known.

entries.name: Starfarer 7M
entries.flavorText: Let no distance come between you.

entries.name: Young Ahamkara's Spine
entries.flavorText: Give me your arm, oh bearer mine. Let me help you fill the world with teeth.

entries.name: Kairos Function Plate
entries.flavorText: "Multiple analyses confirm: the milky radiolarian fluid found in Vex chassis is organic in nature." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Resonant Fury Cowl
entries.flavorText: I see the task before me. I wear it with devotion.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Strides
entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Helmet
entries.flavorText: "Her jumpship was full of dead Ghosts. Some of them were just pieces. We haven't determined how many dead, yet." —Vanguard Security Report Excerpt

entries.name: Mandate of Strength
entries.flavorText: "Might makes right."

entries.name: Insigne Shade Gloves
entries.flavorText: "Warrior-scholars. Reality breakers. Weapons of mass destruction. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Praefectus Mask
entries.flavorText: "The past is the past; we cannot return to it. All we can do now is fight for the future our people deserve, through blade and blood." —Valus Cau'tor

entries.name: Flowing Vest (CODA)
entries.flavorText: A mercurial bust: for one who seeks answers about the Dark.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Mark
entries.flavorText: "Had a face like the end-times and eyes like manna in the desert. One look at him, and I knew I wasn't gonna be saved." —The Drifter

entries.name: Khepri's Horn
entries.flavorText: "I pushed the sun. I can push you, too." —Inscription inside the helm

entries.name: Secant Filaments
entries.flavorText: The nature of the secant is to intercept a curve, a role all human relationships likewise fill.

entries.name: Solstice Plate (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete the "Leviathan" raid on Prestige difficulty.

entries.name: Candescent Gloves
entries.flavorText: Upgrade this item using Kindling and Embers obtained during Solstice 2022.

entries.name: Lightkin Mark
entries.flavorText: "It ain't right to think wanting a better life for yourself and your kin is just a Human value." —Amanda Holliday

entries.name: Solstice Grasps (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Payback Redux mission, defeat enemies with Void grenades, and complete Heroic strikes.

entries.name: Helm of Righteousness
entries.flavorText: "I know what needs to done. And I'm the one to do it." —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Imperious Sun Shell
entries.flavorText: What secrets of the whole lie within this small fraction?

entries.name: Ravager's Ride
entries.flavorText: Not everything found in the depths of a prison should be left there.

entries.name: Warrior's Steed
entries.flavorText: Ride gloriously into adventure… and through it.

entries.name: Hecuba-S
entries.flavorText: "Function over flair… but a little flair never hurt anybody." —Hektor 99-40

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Helm
entries.flavorText: I - You are seen.

entries.name: Fundament Shell
entries.flavorText: The Last Midnight Star

entries.name: Solstice Cloak (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Defeat Bosses

entries.name: Ketchkiller's Gloves
entries.flavorText: "Those other fellas got more hands than you, so make sure you're holdin' bigger guns." —Drifter

entries.name: Cinder Pinion Robes
entries.flavorText: "Your Light is a flame, Guardian. Kindle it, and hear it roar." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Cobra's Hood
entries.flavorText: "I never did find that horn…" —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Farewell
entries.flavorText: "A peace born from violence is no peace at all." —Lady Efrideet

entries.name: Edge of Concurrence
entries.flavorText: An echo of an ancient weapon, forged from a memory of ambition.

entries.name: Solstice Hood (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Nightfall Prestige at or above the bonus threshold.

entries.name: Kairos Function Boots
entries.flavorText: "If the Vex had achieved what we would call 'time travel,' surely none of us would now exist." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Insigne Shade Boots
entries.flavorText: "There has only ever been but a single Shadow from each people I've encountered. Yet there are so many Lights, and I have so little time…" —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal.

entries.name: Solstice Gloves (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete strikes with at least one clanmate.

entries.name: Frumious Cloak
entries.flavorText: Beware!

entries.name: Cowl of Righteousness
entries.flavorText: "You say this is for the greater good. Which good have you deemed lesser?" —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Wrap Speed
entries.flavorText: Your sarcophagus among the stars.

entries.name: Penumbral Mark
entries.flavorText: "The key is to realize the future isn't an enemy to be fought. It's a friend to embrace. A closing of the circle. At last—the right to be last." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Deep Explorer Vestments
entries.flavorText: "Found a hallway, full of statues of Calus in various states of dissection. Sobbing noise coming from the walls."  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 3rd Transmission

entries.name: Chattering Bone
entries.flavorText: We have so much to discuss, o seeker mine.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Boots
entries.flavorText: "What has been awoken can slumber no more." —Techeun Kalli

entries.name: Exodus Down Mark
entries.flavorText: This Guardian armor was repurposed from old Exodus Black crew flight suits.

entries.name: Shattered Warlock Bond
entries.flavorText: A shattered bond marks a broken promise.

entries.name: Sagira's Shell
entries.flavorText: Loyalty does not mean obligation. Only justice is blind.

entries.name: Shadow's Mark
entries.flavorText: “Calus could not heal our air. My planet is still dying. But as long as I serve, I have hope.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.

entries.name: Mark of the Emperor's Champion
entries.flavorText: A gift for the Titan with Ghaul's strength.

entries.name: Fr0st-EE5
entries.flavorText: "Hey, if it works for computers…" —Marcus Ren

entries.name: Bond of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "I never forgot what I saw—the gift the Great Machine could bestow. And Calus promised me more." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: D.F.A.
entries.flavorText: "Osiris said that he started to pity the Red Legion, getting trapped in here for infinite eternities. I think they're getting exactly what they deserve." —Sagira

entries.name: Stronghold
entries.flavorText: I am a shield unto myself.

entries.name: Gauntlets of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be indestructible.

entries.name: Solstice Mark (Majestic)
entries.flavorText: Complete patrols on Io, collect Elemental Orbs of any type in the European Aerial Zone, and defeat enemy combatants with Solar weapons.

entries.name: Kairos Function Plate
entries.flavorText: "Multiple analyses confirm: the milky radiolarian fluid found in Vex chassis is organic in nature." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Loaded Question
entries.flavorText: Hey. You see Cayde around, tell him his gun's ready. —Banshee-44

entries.name: Bond of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: For the Warlock possessed of Ghaul's wisdom.

entries.name: Shadow's Bond
entries.flavorText: “The Fulminator could directly afflict the nervous system of the organics around her. She was pain in all its shades. I will miss her.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Scorched Hunter Cloak
entries.flavorText: Before, you wouldn't have been caught dead with a tattered cloak. But that was before.

entries.name: Bond of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "I never forgot what I saw—the gift the Great Machine could bestow. And Calus promised me more." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: Sojourner's Tale
entries.flavorText: Home is just over the horizon.

entries.name: Age-Old Bond
entries.flavorText: Symbiosis. Not predation. Never predation, o wary one mine.

entries.name: Cryosthesia 77K
entries.flavorText: There are things colder than cold.

entries.name: Pyrrhic Ascent Gloves
entries.flavorText: "I cannot be absolved."—Shayura, Awoken Warlock

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Grips
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes the difference between survival and eradication is just pure, simple stubbornness." —The Drifter

entries.name: Hollow Words
entries.flavorText: Holes for the whole.

entries.name: Robes of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: Repentance has its rewards.

entries.name: Robes of the Fulminator
entries.flavorText: “The Councilors devised a way for the Fulminator to escape her interstellar ark, to the outrage of her people.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Fr0st-EE5
entries.flavorText: "Hey, if it works for computers…" —Marcus Ren

entries.name: Penumbral Mark
entries.flavorText: "The key is to realize the future isn't an enemy to be fought. It's a friend to embrace. A closing of the circle. At last—the right to be last." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Behemoth
entries.flavorText: Particle or planet, it all shatters with enough force.

entries.name: Pathfinder's Bond
entries.flavorText: A beacon, like a flare, burning a sphere of safety in the night.

entries.name: Cry Mutiny
entries.flavorText: Shares were split anew on the bomb-blacked deck.

entries.name: Mark of Medal
entries.flavorText: Your reputation precedes you, like the rumble of a lumbering beast.

entries.name: Headpiece of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: Are you just a phantom in a mirror?

entries.name: Mask of the Fulminator
entries.flavorText: “How does one convince a creature of pure, sentient energy to pledge her loyalty? The agency to leave home is intoxicating for anyone.” — Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: BrayTech Sn0Mask
entries.flavorText: "This is our best work yet." —Project Manager, BrayTech R&D

entries.name: Solstice Mask (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Nightfall Prestige at or above the bonus threshold.

entries.name: Wraps of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "My stealth skin kept me secret. I just watched. To my dismay, the dead Light stood up. Shook himself off." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Mask
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Deep Explorer Hood
entries.flavorText: "Initial entry matches the Guardian's description, a… theater? Psychometer is picking up weird background noise here." —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 1st Transmission

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Plate
entries.flavorText: Bereft of guidance and sanctuary.

entries.name: Qiao's Passing
entries.flavorText: "Bind yourself with compassion and knowledge."

entries.name: Phantasmal Shell
entries.flavorText: "The Light provides." —Mithrax

entries.name: Dust Rock Blues
entries.flavorText: "No job too tough, if the price is good." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz

entries.name: Tigerspite
entries.flavorText: "What else can we do but take up arms?" —Corsair Amrita Vae

entries.name: Helm of the Ace-Defiant
entries.flavorText: “The Sindu inhabited gas giants in the spinward marches. They refused my invitation at first. As with all things, they came to see things my way.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Mask of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: The next time we meet.

entries.name: Solstice Greaves (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Reach "Legend" Crucible Rank.

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Mask
entries.flavorText: Trust him.

entries.name: Opulent Stalker Strides
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the apex of your slaying potential. Should you wish it, this system shall die—from the inside—and make way for what's coming. O champion mine." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: SUROS Regime
entries.flavorText: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

entries.name: Nation of Beasts
entries.flavorText: I can show you how we were in our prime. You need only ask, o student mine.

entries.name: Frumious Cloak
entries.flavorText: Beware!

entries.name: Resonant Fury Boots
entries.flavorText: I sought relief. I found delight.

entries.name: Gauntlets of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "Do I miss my arm? I miss my empire. I would give everything to have it back. And I will." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Boots
entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.name: Exile's Curse
entries.flavorText: It's a blessing in disguise.

entries.name: Estival Excursion
entries.flavorText: Returning home is never as fast as you want it to be.

entries.name: The Supremacy
entries.flavorText: "He didn't recognize me, at the end." —Jolyon Till the Rachis

entries.name: The Frigid Jackal
entries.flavorText: An ice-cold creature of opportunity.

entries.name: Oathkeeper
entries.flavorText: "I have not yet met my true death." —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath

entries.name: Shards of Galanor
entries.flavorText:
"Galanor is beyond my skill to repair."
"…I can work with this."

entries.name: Wing Contender
entries.flavorText: The double-headed phoenix that fights itself represents Guardians who strengthen each other in the Crucible.

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Boots
entries.flavorText: "We stand with the Vanguard. No outside force will break what we have wrought." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Scatterhorn Mark
entries.flavorText: "Lost things have a way of washing up on the Tangled Shore." —The Spider

entries.name: Scatterhorn Boots
entries.flavorText: "The Awoken have been bleeding territories for years now. Tangled Shore was just the first to slip between the cracks." —The Spider

entries.name: Pyrrhic Ascent Bond
entries.flavorText: "Each scar I bear, a trial survived." —Shayura, Awoken Warlock

entries.name: Forbidden Memory
entries.flavorText: Light a candle for those we've lost.

entries.name: Solstice Mask (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Chosen Redux mission, defeat enemies with Void Energy weapons, and complete a Nightfall.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Robes
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes it's a cosmic event. Sometimes it's a beast from hell. Sometimes it's one man." —The Drifter

entries.name: Ascendancy
entries.flavorText: "When the time comes, make yours one to remember." —Petra Venj

entries.name: Boots of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be sure-footed.

entries.name: Lost Pacific Mark
entries.flavorText: Sloane had these Golden Age space suits repurposed for Guardian armor.

entries.name: Opulent Duelist Mark
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the end of all things. The novenary, the Awoken Queen, the sad, strange little man on his rickety boat. They believe they've seen the same. What they don't know will destroy them." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Lost Pacific Cape
entries.flavorText: Sloane had these Golden Age space suits repurposed for Guardian armor.

entries.name: Phobos Warden Bond
entries.flavorText: "The Guardians will come through." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Deep Explorer Mark
entries.flavorText: "Wasn't the exit this way?"  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition Log Final Transmission

entries.name: Ketchkiller's Hood
entries.flavorText: "Every crew needs a captain. Otherwise, who'd take all the credit?" —Drifter

entries.name: Pathfinder's Wraps
entries.flavorText: Place your palms to the dirt and form the path you wish to walk.

entries.name: Mask of the Fulminator
entries.flavorText: “How does one convince a creature of pure, sentient energy to pledge her loyalty? The agency to leave home is intoxicating for anyone.” — Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Headpiece of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: Are you just a phantom in a mirror?

entries.name: Frumious Cloak
entries.flavorText: Beware!

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Plate
entries.flavorText: "What is necessary and what is right are not the same. All that matters is whichever serves you best." —Lisbon-13

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Hood
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Wraps of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: There is nothing I cannot forgive.

entries.name: Wraps of the Fulminator
entries.flavorText: “Before my Councilors and I could finalize her containment armor, the very presence of the Fulminator assaulted the senses. She was breathtaking.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: BrayTech Absolute Zero Mark
entries.flavorText: Easy to spot in a whiteout.

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Boots
entries.flavorText: "My dear, sweet Lusia. You were meant to be next to me in this life, and the next. There's time yet for me to make it so." —Clovis Bray I

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Tabard
entries.flavorText: "There is a place where we can remember who we are." —Imogen Rife

entries.name: Solstice Gauntlets (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Payback Redux mission, defeat enemies with Solar Energy weapons, and complete Heroic strikes.

entries.name: In Memoriam Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who are a beacon of Light.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Mask
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Ego Talon Bond
entries.flavorText: "You will find the nightmares grow worse. Thankfully, you no longer have need of sleep." —Gallida Tuyet

entries.name: Calamity Rig Greaves
entries.flavorText: "They say you can't run from what's coming. They obviously haven't seen old Drifter turn on the jets." —The Drifter

entries.name: Paradigm Shift
entries.flavorText: So fast you'll have to invent new barriers to break.

entries.name: Tommy's Matchbook
entries.flavorText: "It's warm in here."

entries.name: Robes of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be ruthless.

entries.name: Calamity Rig Plate
entries.flavorText: "When the ship goes down, you can't save it. You just gotta choose: go under, or swim." —The Drifter

entries.name: Azure Azazyel
entries.flavorText: Primarily used on the ice caps of Mars during the Golden Age.

entries.name: Vespulaser
entries.flavorText: Warsat incoming.

entries.name: Eon Drive
entries.flavorText: A lost artifact of the Golden Age.

entries.name: Mark of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be feared.

entries.name: Mask of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "I can solve this. Give me a weapon." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer at the Battle of Kaga-Clipse

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Robes
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes it's a cosmic event. Sometimes it's a beast from hell. Sometimes it's one man." —The Drifter

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Greaves
entries.flavorText: "What has been awoken can slumber no more." —Techeun Kalli

entries.name: Solstice Robes (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the 1AU Redux mission, defeat enemies with Solar grenades, and win non-private Crucible matches.

entries.name: Mask of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "Five Lights. Too many to fight. I loosed web grenades and fled." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: Turris Shade Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "Leaders. Elite infantry. Martial teachers. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Zavala's Authority
entries.flavorText: When it moves, it's a ribbon of violet moonlight.

entries.name: Peace by Consensus
entries.flavorText: "The Consensus is bigger than the Speaker. Bigger than any of us. It will survive, because it has to." —Commander Zavala, acting head of the Consensus

entries.name: Hastilude
entries.flavorText:
"Two words. Sparrow jousting." —Marcus Ren
"Two words. Why not?" —Amanda Holliday

entries.name: Dinas Emrys
entries.flavorText: "Watch for the red dragon. Here's a hint: It'll be ahead of you." —Ariadne Gris

entries.name: Vanishing Point
entries.flavorText: "Definition: the point at which you're so far behind, you can't even see me anymore." —Cron-8

entries.name: Ashen Wake
entries.flavorText:
“It is your turn. These people will follow you to the very end. Remember that we were forged in Light.”
 —Aodh, Second Empyreal Magistrate of the Sunbreaker

entries.name: Wormgod Caress
entries.flavorText:
"Have you ever stared into the green soulfire flame? There is terror, but also… something warm."
—Eris Morn

entries.name: Equitis Shade Rig
entries.flavorText: "A little faster. A little more lethal. You are almost ready… to cast a Shadow." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Wish-Ender
entries.flavorText: "Don't fret. It's a simple expedition. We'll be back before lunch." —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath

entries.name: Trinity Ghoul
entries.flavorText: "I couldn't afford to miss. Not when it was his life on the line." —Marin Mansanas, Tangled Outrider

entries.name: Kairos Function Robes
entries.flavorText: "Multiple analyses confirm: the milky radiolarian fluid found in Vex chassis is organic in nature." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Crushing Guard (CODA)
entries.flavorText: A forceful limb: for one who seeks answers about the Dark.

entries.name: Planck's Stride
entries.flavorText: "You may speak as freely as your willingness to take punishment." —Pirate Lord Arask

entries.name: Bond of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be respected.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Helm
entries.flavorText: "Since the Scatter, nowhere in the Reef felt like home. Before I knew it, I found myself on the Shore." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz

entries.name: Peacebond
entries.flavorText: "I will honor the terms of this armistice on one condition: the Iron Lords enforce it." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Solstice Helm (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Nightfall Prestige at or above the bonus threshold.

entries.name: Opulent Scholar Hood
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the victories that your wisdom shall win in my name. Over and over." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Symmetry Flight
entries.flavorText: "To have Light, we must have Dark. This is the symmetry of the Universe." —Controversial Warlock Ulan-Tan

entries.name: Python
entries.flavorText: "If they let you get that close, they deserve it." —The Drifter

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Chestplate
entries.flavorText: Surrounded by shadows.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Perhaps it was not the correct choice. But it was the right choice." —Yasmin Eld

entries.name: Gensym Knight Bond
entries.flavorText: "Remember, the universe is a chaotic system. This frippery won't protect you from the continuum." —Asher Mir

entries.name: Vest of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "The Loyalists won't be ready until every world in this system casts a Shadow. Calus will get us there." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Hood
entries.flavorText: "They have succeeded, somehow. But they will succeed no longer." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Greaves of Rull
entries.flavorText: “Valus Nohr marched on our capital with a few thousand. For weeks we battered them. But the Valus. She broke us.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.

entries.name: Greaves of the Emperor's Champion
entries.flavorText: The chorus of regret must be deafening.

entries.name: Exodus Down Cloak
entries.flavorText: This Guardian armor was repurposed from old Exodus Black crew flight suits.

entries.name: Turris Shade Helm
entries.flavorText: "You have truly grown fat from strength. Magnificent." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Ketchkiller's Helmet
entries.flavorText: "Even from the deck of a Ketch, your Light can shatter the stars." —Mithrax

entries.name: Astrocyte Verse
entries.flavorText: The ideocosm contained within this helm transforms the wearer's head from flesh and/or exoneurons to the pure, raw stuff of thought.

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Mask
entries.flavorText: "Her jumpship was full of dead Ghosts. Some of them were just pieces. We haven't determined how many dead, yet." —Vanguard Security Report Excerpt

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Gloves
entries.flavorText: II - You are held.

entries.name: Revenant
entries.flavorText: From a whisper to a roar, be the calm and the storm.

entries.name: Solstice Mark (Scorched)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Payback Redux mission, collect Void orbs, and complete patrols.

entries.name: Shadow's Robes
entries.flavorText: "Nothing. Nothing can stop us. You and I are pillars of this existence, and shall be until all comes crashing down." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Borrowed Time
entries.flavorText: "Give a little, but take a little more." —The Drifter

entries.name: Kairos Function Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Some speculate that the radiolarian fluid is the last vestige of a biological life-form that became the Vex." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Cloak of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be renowned.

entries.name: Kairos Function Boots
entries.flavorText: "If the Vex had achieved what we would call 'time travel,' surely none of us would now exist." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Cinder Pinion Vest
entries.flavorText: "Your Light is a flame, Guardian. Kindle it, and hear it roar." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Robes
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes it's a cosmic event. Sometimes it's a beast from hell. Sometimes it's one man." —The Drifter

entries.name: Illicit Invader Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Outlawed Invader Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Notorious Invader Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Far Future
entries.flavorText: "Distance is just a matter of timing." —Crow

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Mask
entries.flavorText: "It's not just what I'm capable of. It's how I use it that makes the difference." —Ada-1

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Bond
entries.flavorText: "Had a face like the end-times and eyes like manna in the desert. One look at him, and I knew I wasn't gonna be saved." —The Drifter

entries.name: Foetracer
entries.flavorText: "I see you."

entries.name: Lucky Raspberry
entries.flavorText:
> No one has ever died wearing me.
# It's true. She leaves the unworthy before they fall.

entries.name: Opulent Stalker Mask
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the victories that your cunning shall win in my name. Over and over." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Grips of the Ace-Defiant
entries.flavorText: “The Sindu fly like surgeons operate. And the Ace-Defiants are the best among them. Only one Shadowed me.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Gloves of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: You left me with nothing, but now I have everything.

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Strides
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We crossed a burning world with sword in hand, bringing justice and blood." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Plate
entries.flavorText: "There is a place where we can remember who we are." —Imogen Rife

entries.name: Opulent Duelist Greaves
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the apex of your fighting potential. Should you wish it, this system shall fall and make way for what's coming. O champion mine." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Calamity Rig Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Funny how nobody listens to doomsayers. They're the most honest folk I know." —The Drifter

entries.name: Shadow's Vest
entries.flavorText: "Nothing. Nothing can stop us. You and I shall take back the pillars of existence from the lost athenaeum worlds." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Line in the Sand
entries.flavorText: No farther.

entries.name: Notorious Sentry Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you defend him, Hunter?

entries.name: Illicit Sentry Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you defend him, Hunter?

entries.name: Outlawed Sentry Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you defend him, Hunter?

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Bond
entries.flavorText: "I do not sit and theologize my enemies. I crush them." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Kairos Function Mask
entries.flavorText: "Future War Cult has an artifact they call 'The Device' which may be Vex in origin." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Trichromatica
entries.flavorText: "Void, Solar, then Arc. Hmm. We're not naive enough to think the order is a coincidence. But we've got bigger things to worry about." —Zavala

entries.name: Tomorrow's Answer
entries.flavorText: Could you please repeat the question?

entries.name: Helm of Righteousness
entries.flavorText: "I know what needs to done. And I'm the one to do it." —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Gauntlets of Exaltation
entries.flavorText: "Did you see that? Do you see what I can do?" —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Challenger Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts ready to face any challenge.

entries.name: Scorched Hunter Cloak
entries.flavorText: Before, you wouldn't have been caught dead with a tattered cloak. But that was before.

entries.name: Vest of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be daring.

entries.name: Shadow's Boots
entries.flavorText: "The task before us is staggering. We must unite all races and creeds. We shall win them to our side with words where we can. And with your Light where we cannot." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes the difference between survival and eradication is just pure, simple stubbornness." —The Drifter

entries.name: Ophidia Spathe
entries.flavorText: Listen carefully when the serpent speaks, for its tongue is forked, and its words have two meanings.

entries.name: Deafening Whisper
entries.flavorText: "The right message is loud at any volume." —Osiris

entries.name: Generation's Shadow
entries.flavorText: We are where we came from.

entries.name: Gloves of Exaltation
entries.flavorText: "You're honest. You're true. If anyone can handle the responsibility of this power, it's you." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Resonant Fury Strides
entries.flavorText: I walk the void, and through this journey, I learn that no place shall embrace me.

entries.name: Silicon Neuroma
entries.flavorText: "My future is concurrently irreversible and unknowable. Before it overtakes me, I desire a more abrupt end to those responsible." —Asher Mir

entries.name: Cloak of Remembrance
entries.flavorText: To inspire our wards with a practiced flourish.

entries.name: Kairos Function Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Some speculate that the radiolarian fluid is the last vestige of a biological life-form that became the Vex." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Hood
entries.flavorText: "I've learned not to be ashamed of the fear. It's to be expected, given what we are." —Pavel Nolg

entries.name: Star-Eater Scales
entries.flavorText: Feast on the sky. Gorge yourself until all starlight has been gnawed to black—then the cosmos will tremble with your roar.

entries.name: Pyrrhic Ascent Mask
entries.flavorText: "From the first whisper, I knew it spoke truth." —Aisha, Human Hunter

entries.name: BrayTech Iron-Heart Engine
entries.flavorText: The air is cold, but our hearts are warm.

entries.name: Calamity Rig Sleeves
entries.flavorText: "The signs are always there, if you know what to look for. Most folks don't." —The Drifter

entries.name: BrayTech Researcher's Gloves
entries.flavorText: Warm hands, warm heart.

entries.name: Pathfinder's Mark
entries.flavorText: A sigil of solidarity between two cities.

entries.name: Praefectus Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Feast, my comrades. Torobatl may be lost, but its spirit lives on in our traditions." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Hood
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Wise Warlock Bond
entries.flavorText: "If you dedicate yourself to the study of the universe, it will always reveal its secrets to you." —Ikora Rey

entries.name: It Stared Back
entries.flavorText: At the edge of the universe, I stared into the infinite deep. It stared back, and was pleased. I would become the herald of its victory, and bear witness for all creation.

entries.name: Motion to Vacate
entries.flavorText: "Done cannot be undone."

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Cloak
entries.flavorText: "How would one such as myself commit Human error when I am no longer Human?" —Hari-5

entries.name: Solstice Plate (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the 1AU Redux mission, defeat enemies with Arc grenades, and win non-private Crucible matches.

entries.name: Mark of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be feared.

entries.name: Phobos Warden Gloves
entries.flavorText: "Stay strong. Be brave." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Kairos Function Boots
entries.flavorText: "If the Vex had achieved what we would call 'time travel,' surely none of us would now exist." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Greaves
entries.flavorText: "We're notifying fireteam members and life partners as we identify the Ghost remains. It's going to take a while."  —Vanguard Security Report Excerpt

entries.name: The Comedian
entries.flavorText: A. A ha. A ha ha ha. A ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.

entries.name: Skull of Dire Ahamkara
entries.flavorText: Reality is the finest flesh, oh bearer mine. And are you not…hungry?

entries.name: Boots of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "The Clipse worship guns. That's why Rull and I have an understanding. Even if he's not bright." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer

entries.name: Turris Shade Mark
entries.flavorText: "This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. And they should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: ACD/0 Feedback Fence
entries.flavorText: The Active Contact Defense system uses warsat hull materials to store a retaliatory charge.

entries.name: Doom Fang Pauldron
entries.flavorText: Nobody calls it that.

entries.name: Synthoceps
entries.flavorText: Caution: the organism has been known to develop consciousness. In these cases, immediate termination is recommended.

entries.name: Resonant Fury Cloak
entries.flavorText: I wear the void, and through this empathy, I learn that only my will endures.

entries.name: Brave Titan's Mark
entries.flavorText: A Mark meant to honor the stalwart defenders of the Last City.

entries.name: Temptation's Mark
entries.flavorText: "If this is wrong, I don't want to be right." —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Celestine Robes (Majestic)
entries.flavorText:
During Solstice 2021:
- Complete Blind Well activities in the Dreaming City or Wrathborn Hunts from Season of the Hunt.
- Collect Solstice Key Fragments.
- Defeat combatants with Void grenades.

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Bond
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We crushed the Warlords beneath our heel so that they may never rise again." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Pathfinder's Tunic
entries.flavorText: Forged from the reinforced armor of fallen Corsairs to shepherd the lost as they no longer can.

entries.name: Coalition Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who want to make a statement in Cabal circles.

entries.name: Shinobu's Vow
entries.flavorText: "No supplies. Armor in tatters. But the refugees had asked for help. And she had given her word." —Tale of the Six Coyotes

entries.name: Daring Hunter Cloak
entries.flavorText: Flip a coin. Heads, the Hunter wins. Tails, the other guy loses.

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Helm
entries.flavorText: Trust him.

entries.name: Wing Contender
entries.flavorText: The double-headed phoenix that fights itself represents Guardians who strengthen each other in the Crucible.

entries.name: Illicit Invader Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Titan?

entries.name: Candescent Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: Upgrade this item using Kindling and Embers obtained during Solstice 2022.

entries.name: Intercepted Transmission
entries.flavorText: "I don't pick pockets, I pick people." —Spider

entries.name: Cinder Pinion Strides
entries.flavorText: "They can't kill what they can't catch. Take flight." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Scatterhorn Wraps
entries.flavorText: "That's no ordinary dust. You're standing on the pulverized remnants of 1 Ceres." —Corsair Anzani Lyle

entries.name: Wing Contender
entries.flavorText: The double-headed phoenix that fights itself represents Guardians who strengthen each other in the Crucible.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Hood
entries.flavorText: "I've learned not to be ashamed of the fear. It's to be expected, given what we are." —Pavel Nolg

entries.name: Forge's Pledge
entries.flavorText: "Say whatever you like. You'd just better be brave enough to say it to his face."  —Lady Efrideet

entries.name: Scatterhorn Strides
entries.flavorText: "The Awoken have been bleeding territories for years now. Tangled Shore was just the first to slip between the cracks." —The Spider

entries.name: Ketchkiller's Mask
entries.flavorText: "A smart captain keeps one eye on their own back." —Spider

entries.name: Apotheosis Veil
entries.flavorText: Most helmets protect the mind from the universe. Not this one.

entries.name: Extraordinary Rendition
entries.flavorText: "My warriors fight not for themselves, or even me, but for each other." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Oathkeeper
entries.flavorText: "I have not yet met my true death." —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath

entries.name: Shards of Galanor
entries.flavorText:
"Galanor is beyond my skill to repair."
"…I can work with this."

entries.name: Rose and Bone
entries.flavorText: In his strong hand the man held a Rose. And his aura burned bright.

entries.name: Shadow's Strides
entries.flavorText: "All that we've left in the athenaeum catalogs are suitable proxies for all the powers of this system. I've simply forgotten how to reach them. I'm not who I was. I need you." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Color of Speed
entries.flavorText: "After a certain point, speed is a matter of willpower." —Petra Venj

entries.name: Gloves of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: You left me with nothing, but now I have everything.

entries.name: Grips of the Ace-Defiant
entries.flavorText: “The Sindu fly like surgeons operate. And the Ace-Defiants are the best among them. Only one Shadowed me.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Ivory Empress
entries.flavorText: When atop this vehicle, the crowds will part before you. By force, if necessary.

entries.name: Kairos Function Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "Vex structures on Venus and Mercury predate the Golden Age, and possibly Humanity itself." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Chroma Rush
entries.flavorText: Drink from the data stream.

entries.name: Grips of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be precise.

entries.name: Midnight Coup
entries.flavorText: The conspirators were too afraid to kill me—rightly so. I am the beloved father of the people, and the glorious mob would not suffer my death. My sentence was exile.

entries.name: Shadow's Helm
entries.flavorText: "The mysteries of the universe lie before you. Unresolved. Threatening. You and I will face them together. As true Cabal." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Gensym Knight Mark
entries.flavorText: "Remember, the universe is a chaotic system. This frippery won't protect you from the continuum." —Asher Mir

entries.name: Opulent Stalker Cloak
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the end of all things. The novenary, the Awoken Queen, the sad, strange little man on his rickety boat. They believe they've seen the same. What they don't know shall destroy them." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Temptation's Bond
entries.flavorText: "You said you'd always trust me. Trust me." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Plate of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be brave.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Grasps
entries.flavorText: "We've progressed into a liminal space. Corridors folding on each other. Psychometer is spiking here; are we sure this is safe?" —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 2nd Transmission

entries.name: Wild Hunt Cloak
entries.flavorText: Hide in shadow.

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Strides
entries.flavorText: Salvation, at last.

entries.name: Insigne Shade Cover
entries.flavorText: "You have truly grown fat from strength. And you are still as wise as ever. Magnificent." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Dunemarchers
entries.flavorText: Whether on solid rock or shifting sand dune, the inexorable Sand Eaters never slow their pace.

entries.name: Gemini Jester
entries.flavorText: "I love making people laugh. And by 'people,' I mean me. Haha!" "Haha! Me!"

entries.name: Scatterhorn Mask
entries.flavorText: "Since the Scatter, nowhere in the Reef felt like home. Before I knew it, I found myself on the Shore." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Strides
entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.name: Otherside
entries.flavorText: There is always a player on the nightside, unseen and perfect—and patient.

entries.name: The Messenger (Adept)
entries.flavorText: The bearer of bad news.

entries.name: Universal Wavefunction
entries.flavorText: "I believed your presence at the genesis of the Infinite Forest would lead to a comprehensive understanding of the Vex. When will I learn that things are never so simple?" —Ikora

entries.name: Thin Line
entries.flavorText: Sometimes you forget which side you're on.

entries.name: Turris Shade Helm
entries.flavorText: "You have truly grown fat from strength. Magnificent." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Felwinter's Lie
entries.flavorText: "I just like the name. Doesn't mean anything." —Lord Felwinter to Lord Timur

entries.name: Illicit Reaper Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Sailspy Pitchglass
entries.flavorText: There are shapes on the horizon not yet meant to be seen.

entries.name: Relentless
entries.flavorText: "Embrace your fate." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes the difference between survival and eradication is just pure, simple stubbornness." —The Drifter

entries.name: Daring Hunter Cloak
entries.flavorText: Flip a coin. Heads, the Hunter wins. Tails, the other guy loses.

entries.name: Mask of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be cunning.

entries.name: Citan's Ramparts
entries.flavorText: "Let them try to break through." —Lord Citan

entries.name: Hallowfire Heart
entries.flavorText: "You who seek the Forge: your journey will be long, but your destination is closer than you think." —Ouros

entries.name: Kairos Function Grips
entries.flavorText: "Vex structures on Venus and Mercury predate the Golden Age, and possibly Humanity itself." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Boots
entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.name: Opulent Duelist Helm
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the victories that your strength shall win in my name. Over and over." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Criticality of Quickness
entries.flavorText: A lot can happen in 72 hours. Three days can change the course of a hundred lives.

entries.name: Boots of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be sure-footed.

entries.name: Opulent Duelist Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the work that will bring this system together. I'll need your strength." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Phobos Warden Greaves
entries.flavorText: "We are deploying Guardians to all corners of the system." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Truth
entries.flavorText: "…is where you seek it." —Lomar

entries.name: The Underdog
entries.flavorText: Kicked, starved, or scorned, I always get up. I always go on.

entries.name: Team Spirit
entries.flavorText: "No Guardian works alone." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Calamity Rig Mask
entries.flavorText: "Always bet on the apocalypse. Best case, you're wrong. Worst case… at least your bag's packed." —The Drifter

entries.name: Cinder Pinion Boots
entries.flavorText: "They can't kill what they can't catch. Take flight." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Pathfinder's Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: Place yourself at the gate. Pry it open, and hold it for those who follow.

entries.name: Cold Denial
entries.flavorText: A familiar tool in the face of failure.

entries.name: The Bombardiers
entries.flavorText: "Tallulah Fairwind never turns down a dare." —Tallulah Fairwind

entries.name: Crushing Greaves (CODA)
entries.flavorText: A forceful brace: for one who seeks answers about the Dark.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Robe
entries.flavorText: "Was Wolf once. Still Wolf after Scatter, but… different. Then Queen's. Wolf again. Bannerless. Then Spider's." —Avrok

entries.name: Robes of the Fulminator
entries.flavorText: “The Councilors devised a way for the Fulminator to escape her interstellar ark, to the outrage of her people.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Robes of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: Repentance has its rewards.

entries.name: Trespasser
entries.flavorText: "You are not welcome."

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Hood
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Edge of Action
entries.flavorText: An echo of an ancient weapon, forged from a memory of strength.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Plate
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes it's a cosmic event. Sometimes it's a beast from hell. Sometimes it's one man." —The Drifter

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Legguards
entries.flavorText: IV - You are led.

entries.name: Plate of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "Rull threatens, but he'll fall in line. The Clipse just don't like to lose." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: Lightkin Cover
entries.flavorText: "It has been a long time since Eliksni looked up at the Great Machine with hope. It is an honor to live in this moment." —Mithrax

entries.name: Lucky Pants
entries.flavorText: "What? No, I didn't illegally mod the holster. These are just really lucky pants!" —Cayde-6

entries.name: Orpheus Rig
entries.flavorText: Never, ever, look back.

entries.name: St0mp-EE5
entries.flavorText: "I call them the Stompies! For when your legs need that extra kick." —Marcus Ren

entries.name: Sweet Sorrow
entries.flavorText: A scratched-out inscription on the barrel reads, "A birthday is just a number. How about we pick this one?"

entries.name: Lightkin Boots
entries.flavorText: "With the arrival of the Pyramids, and now these Eliksni joining us in the Last City, I can't help but feel like we haven't ever truly understood the war we're fighting. But I believe we are learning quickly now." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Shell of Gilgamesh
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who've delved into the underworld.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Robe
entries.flavorText: "Was Wolf once. Still Wolf after Scatter, but… different. Then Queen's. Wolf again. Bannerless. Then Spider's." —Avrok

entries.name: Opulent Scholar Bond
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the end of all things. The novenary, the Awoken Queen, the sad, strange little man on his rickety boat. They believe they've seen the same. What they don't know will destroy them." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Steelfeather Repeater
entries.flavorText: There is strength in delicate things.

entries.name: Mask of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "I can solve this. Give me a weapon." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer at the Battle of Kaga-Clipse

entries.name: Mask of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be cunning.

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Gloves
entries.flavorText: Caught alone in a tangled web.

entries.name: Pyrrhic Ascent Helm
entries.flavorText: "Under a sturdy enough helmet, no one can see how damaged you are." —Reed-7, Exo Titan

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Strides
entries.flavorText: "I'm more interested in where I'm going." —Banshee-44

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Mask
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Candescent Strides
entries.flavorText: Upgrade this item using Kindling and Embers obtained during Solstice 2022.

entries.name: Wild Hunt Gloves
entries.flavorText: Tug at the threads of causality.

entries.name: Mechabre
entries.flavorText: The killer robot killer.

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Cloak

entries.flavorText: I - You are seen.

entries.flavorText: "You ever hook a Ghost's navigation telemetry up to a jumpship? Me neither, but there's a first time for everything." —The Drifter

entries.flavorText: It has been melted and reforged many times.

entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the work that will bring this system together. I'll need your wisdom." —Emperor Calus

entries.flavorText: Starlight is your guide. No vacuum will contain you.

entries.flavorText: "He walked out into the demon light. But at the end he was brighter." —Paean to Saint-14

entries.flavorText:
During Solstice 2021:
- Complete Glory Rank playlist activities, Nightfall strikes, or matches in Trials of Osiris.
- Collect Void Elemental Orbs in the European Aerial Zone activity.
- Defeat powerful Fallen.

entries.name: Ruinous Effigy
entries.flavorText: From the many wings of ruin blows a wind that will reshape this dead world.

entries.name: Gjallarhorn
entries.flavorText: “If there is beauty in destruction, why not also in its delivery?” — Feizel Crux

entries.name: The Last Word
entries.flavorText: "Yours, until the last flame dies and all words have been spoken." —Shin Malphur to you, as you journey forth into the unknown

entries.name: Tears of Contrition
entries.flavorText: Message transmission successful // Message deleted without opening // Resend?

entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the work that will bring this system together. I'll need your cunning." —Emperor Calus

entries.flavorText: The charged eye of a Vex Gate Lord can be used to infiltrate the most protected layers of their network… and reverse engineered to confer incredible powers to its bearer.

entries.flavorText: What will we be to each other in the next life?

entries.flavorText: This might sting a little.

entries.flavorText: They were so optimistic about us.

entries.flavorText: Looking for a quiet place to watch the end of the world.

entries.flavorText: On the cusp between life and light, between death and destruction.

See who's robed as if a god, who stands with pride above the rest!
Destroy this ancient nameless fraud! Destroy the one whose death was blessed!

entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.flavorText: "This won't end well for one of us. And darling, it won't be me." —Self-styled "Lady" Olu Alderdice

“It is your turn. These people will follow you to the very end. Remember that we were forged in Light.”
 —Aodh, Second Empyreal Magistrate of the Sunbreaker

entries.flavorText:
"Have you ever stared into the green soulfire flame? There is terror, but also… something warm."
—Eris Morn

entries.flavorText: The phoenix that fights itself, then rises from its ashes stronger than ever. That is the Crucible.

entries.flavorText: "In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabal… are not a subtle people." —Tyra Karn

entries.name: Holborn's Splint
entries.flavorText: This craft saw some strange action on Phobos, both planned and… otherwise.

entries.name: Lost Legend
entries.flavorText: A BrayTech Model X-JY5438 (refurbished).

entries.name: Shadow Trespass
entries.flavorText: Dampened hulls help avoid detection.

entries.name: BrayTech Sn0Helm
entries.flavorText: Great for avoiding a brain freeze.

entries.name: Stormcaller
entries.flavorText: Harmony within, hurricane without.

entries.name: Disparity
entries.flavorText: "Identify yourself, or be destroyed." —Clovis Bray I

entries.name: Gensym Knight Bond
entries.flavorText: "Remember, the universe is a chaotic system. This frippery won't protect you from the continuum." —Asher Mir

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Gloves
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes the difference between survival and eradication is just pure, simple stubbornness." —The Drifter

entries.name: BrayTech Winter Wolf
entries.flavorText: The leader of the pack endures through the harshest conditions.

entries.name: Mask of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "Five Lights. Too many to fight. I loosed web grenades and fled." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: Holdfast Mark
entries.flavorText: In rememberance of those who never saw the sun rise after battle's end.

entries.name: Grand Overture
entries.flavorText: It's not over until the vast red artificial intelligence sings.

entries.name: Kairos Function Helm
entries.flavorText: "Future War Cult has an artifact they call 'The Device' which may be Vex in origin." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Sunstead Plate (Majestic)
entries.flavorText:
During Solstice 2021:
- Complete Blind Well activities in the Dreaming City or Wrathborn Hunts from Season of the Hunt.
- Collect Solstice Key Fragments.
- Defeat combatants with Arc grenades.

entries.name: Opulent Duelist Greaves
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the apex of your fighting potential. Should you wish it, this system shall fall and make way for what's coming. O champion mine." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: New Purpose
entries.flavorText: I see you adorned in spots of blood like fallen rose petals. I see you victorious and bathed in light, I see you.

entries.name: Shinobu's Vow
entries.flavorText: "No supplies. Armor in tatters. But the refugees had asked for help. And she had given her word." —Tale of the Six Coyotes

entries.name: Robes of Transcendence
entries.flavorText: "Do you think this makes you better than us?" —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Hood
entries.flavorText: "How many of these damn things are there?"  —First Lieutenant Artur Voronin

entries.name: Lightkin Cloak
entries.flavorText: "The way folks act toward the Eliksni shows you who they really are. Not sure if that's the worst or best part of this." —Amanda Holliday

entries.name: Turris Shade Greaves
entries.flavorText: "There has only ever been but a single Shadow from each people I've encountered. Yet there are so many Lights, and I have so little time…" —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal.

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Greaves
entries.flavorText: IV - You are led.

entries.name: Razor's Edge
entries.flavorText: Not a soul would speak of what remained after that wretched blade found its marks.

entries.name: 18 Kelvins
entries.flavorText: Cold-blooded.

entries.name: Vesper of Radius
entries.flavorText: "Drawn like so, the Rift circle reinscribes planetary energy as a destructive force." —Ikora Rey, "On Circles, Volume 12"

entries.name: Touch of Malice
entries.flavorText: "Let them feel every lash, every curse, every touch of malice that they first dealt to me." —Eris Morn

entries.name: Grips of Exaltation
entries.flavorText: "You have the hands of an artist. Fortunately for us, one of those arts is war." —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Xenos Vale Bond
entries.flavorText: New things are only strange until you behold them. Then they are even stranger.

entries.name: Exodus Down Bond
entries.flavorText: This Guardian armor was repurposed from old Exodus Black crew flight suits.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Plate
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes it's a cosmic event. Sometimes it's a beast from hell. Sometimes it's one man." —The Drifter

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Vestments
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We rose from the ashes of a dying world to save humanity from itself." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: The End
entries.flavorText: "Show them that safe harbor is very far away." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: The Took Offense
entries.flavorText: This armor may not be as thick as rhino hide, but it does smell better. That's something.

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Boots
entries.flavorText: Salvation, at last.

entries.name: Ketchkiller's Mark
entries.flavorText: "Not all deserve your protection, but all will have it." —Mithrax

entries.name: Ager's Scepter
entries.flavorText: "One day, you will mold the world to your liking, dear brother, as I always have." —Queen Mara Sov

entries.name: Ketchkiller's Grips
entries.flavorText: "Being captain just means everyone has a reason to want you gone." —Spider

entries.name: Ether Doctor
entries.flavorText: "Control the supply." —The Spider

entries.name: Candescent Hood
entries.flavorText: Upgrade this item using Kindling and Embers obtained during Solstice 2022.

entries.name: Solstice Bond (Scorched)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Payback Redux mission, collect Void orbs, and complete patrols.

entries.name: Dawning Cheer
entries.flavorText: Some traditions are too good to be true.

entries.name: Ursa Furiosa
entries.flavorText: "Stay back. I won't tell you again." —Bjorna-3

entries.name: Fallen Sunstar
entries.flavorText: Judge us by the enemies we've made.

entries.name: Wavesplitter
entries.flavorText: Omolon's newest breakthrough uses focused sonic waves to superheat electrons into a devastating energy beam.

entries.name: Traveler's Chosen
entries.flavorText: "All we have left now is our faith."

entries.name: Kairos Function Wraps
entries.flavorText: "Vex structures on Venus and Mercury predate the Golden Age, and possibly Humanity itself." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Something New
entries.flavorText: "It's new to me." —Banshee-44

entries.name: Scatterhorn Helm
entries.flavorText: "Since the Scatter, nowhere in the Reef felt like home. Before I knew it, I found myself on the Shore." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz

entries.name: Winter's Guile
entries.flavorText: "I know you." —Lord Felwinter

entries.name: Karnstein Armlets
entries.flavorText: “You are mine, you shall be mine, you and I are one for ever.”

entries.name: Sunbracers
entries.flavorText: "When one can wield the fire of stars, what use is flesh and bone?"

entries.name: Shadow's Plate
entries.flavorText: "Nothing. Nothing can stop us. You and I shall uphold the pillars of existence until the end comes. And when it does…" —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Scatterhorn Vest
entries.flavorText: "Was Wolf once. Still Wolf after Scatter, but… different. Then Queen's. Wolf again. Bannerless. Then Spider's." —Avrok

entries.name: Worldline Zero
entries.flavorText: A single strike can alter the course of history.

entries.name: Gensym Knight Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Remember, the universe is a chaotic system. This frippery won't protect you from the continuum." —Asher Mir

entries.name: Gensym Knight Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Remember, the universe is a chaotic system. This frippery won't protect you from the continuum." —Asher Mir

entries.name: Cuirass of the Emperor's Champion
entries.flavorText: What will we be to each other in the next life?

entries.name: Chassis of Rull
entries.flavorText: “Calus invited the Clipse to join his Loyalists. We refused, at first. So he sent a Shadow.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.

entries.name: Robes of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "There was a sixth Light. He cut me and I cut him, but I had more arms. He fell in pieces." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: A Sudden Death
entries.flavorText: "Everything dies. This is proof." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Gauntlets of the Emperor's Champion
entries.flavorText: I will be the last light to go out at the party.

entries.name: Gauntlets of Rull
entries.flavorText: “Calus had won. But he took nothing from us. Instead he gave us everything we needed to end our perpetual war.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.

entries.name: Phobos Warden Helm
entries.flavorText: "I'm fine. Begin the transmission."  —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Notorious Invader Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Illicit Invader Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Outlawed Invader Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Qiao's Care
entries.flavorText: "Always reach for understanding and compassion."

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "My path is my own. Now, and forever." —Shiro-4

entries.name: Boots of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be sure-footed.

entries.name: Whisper of the Worm
entries.flavorText: A Guardian's power makes a rich feeding ground. Do not be revolted. There are parasites that may benefit the host… teeth sharper than your own.

entries.name: Calamity Rig Helm
entries.flavorText: "Always bet on the apocalypse. Best case, you're wrong. Worst case… at least your bag's packed." —The Drifter

entries.name: Mark Judgment (CODA)
entries.flavorText: A forceful gift: for one who seeks answers about the Dark.

entries.name: Warden's Wailer
entries.flavorText: They shall fear the sound of your approach.

entries.name: Shadow's Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "With my knowledge of the future and all that you've seen and done… The victories borne of it… What can stop us at the end of all things?" —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Mk. 44 Stand Asides
entries.flavorText: Pardon me. Coming through.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Grasps
entries.flavorText: "For starlight was my mother, and my father was the dark." —Queen Mara Sov

entries.name: Opulent Stalker Grips
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the work that will bring this system together. I'll need your cunning." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Contraverse Hold
entries.flavorText: "Nothing is free. I know that. Therefore, he knows it too. If our places were swapped, he would do the same." —Tomek I

entries.name: Aeon Safe
entries.flavorText: "We are unique emanations of the same shared Light." —Cult of the Aeons

entries.name: The Summoner
entries.flavorText: Join the dance of fire and birth.

entries.name: Opulent Duelist Plate
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen what must fall so the Empire may rise. Your mastery of war shall make true Cabal of us all." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Prosecutor
entries.flavorText: "All this in service of one purpose. You have their attention. Let us see if you can keep it." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Notorious Reaper Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Illicit Reaper Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Outlawed Reaper Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Hunter?

entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Outlawed Invader Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Illicit Invader Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Bond
entries.flavorText: "Perhaps it was not the correct choice. But it was the right choice." —Yasmin Eld

entries.name: BrayTech Osprey
entries.flavorText: Expected Use Timeframe: UNKNOWN.

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Bond
entries.flavorText: Let him find what he needs.

entries.name: Shadow's Mask
entries.flavorText: "The athenaeum worlds lie before you. Everything from the Empire of old that was—and has been lost. You and I will rediscover them together. As true Cabal." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Omnioculus
entries.flavorText: See the danger, even when it cannot see you.

entries.name: Shadow's Strides
entries.flavorText: "All that we've left in the athenaeum catalogs are suitable proxies for all the powers of this system. I've simply forgotten how to reach them. I'm not who I was. I need you." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Cinder Pinion Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: Ikora Rey still holds the record for most consecutive victories in the Crucible. No one else has come close.

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Legguards
entries.flavorText: Searching for here and now.

entries.name: Shadow's Grips
entries.flavorText: "With my knowledge of the future and all that you've seen and done… The silence borne of it… What can stop us at the end of all things?" —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Praefectus Greaves
entries.flavorText: "Ghaul commanded you to die for his vanity. I ask only that you fight at my side for the empire. The choice is yours." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Cloak
entries.flavorText: Let him find what he needs.

entries.name: Gauntlets of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be indestructible.

entries.name: High Gravitas
entries.flavorText: "That's a clean-looking ride, Guardian. How about we get her scuffed up a little?" —Amanda Holliday

entries.name: Bump in the Night
entries.flavorText: "If you hear a noise in the dark, shoot first." —Centurion Tuk'rin

entries.name: Gloves of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: You left me with nothing, but now I have everything.

entries.name: Grips of the Ace-Defiant
entries.flavorText: “The Sindu fly like surgeons operate. And the Ace-Defiants are the best among them. Only one Shadowed me.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: BrayTech Winter Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Not every piece of equipment is optimal for all environments. You see snow. I see a thousand hiding places." —Designer, BrayTech R&D

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Greaves
entries.flavorText: Salvation, at last.

entries.name: Solstice Greaves (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Spark Redux mission, defeat enemies with Void melee abilities, and complete adventures.

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Robe
entries.flavorText: III - You are hollowed.

entries.name: Illicit Collector Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Titan?

entries.name: Outlawed Collector Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Titan?

entries.name: Notorious Collector Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Titan?

entries.name: Outlawed Reaper Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Illicit Reaper Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Notorious Reaper Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Mark
entries.flavorText: "Perhaps it was not the correct choice. But it was the right choice." —Yasmin Eld

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "We believe she's also responsible for the dead Guardian and Eliksni we found on Venus. We haven't identified which dead Ghost belongs to the Guardian." —Vanguard Security Report Excerpt

entries.name: Scatterhorn Greaves
entries.flavorText: "The Awoken have been bleeding territories for years now. Tangled Shore was just the first to slip between the cracks." —The Spider

entries.name: Mask of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "I'm a Valus before I'm a 'Shadow.' But Calus is the empire's last, best hope. His plan is my plan." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: BrayTech Researcher's Hood
entries.flavorText: Featuring the latest in autocorrecting lens technology.

entries.name: Opulent Duelist Greaves
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the apex of your fighting potential. Should you wish it, this system shall fall and make way for what's coming. O champion mine." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Stormdancer's Brace
entries.flavorText: After all, isn't lightning better outside the bottle?

entries.name: Shadow's Mask
entries.flavorText: "The athenaeum worlds lie before you. Everything from the Empire of old that was—and has been lost. You and I will rediscover them together. As true Cabal." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Lost Pacific Bond
entries.flavorText: Sloane had these Golden Age space suits repurposed for Guardian armor.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Helm
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: D.F.A. (Adept)
entries.flavorText: "Osiris said that he started to pity the Red Legion, getting trapped in here for infinite eternities. I think they're getting exactly what they deserve." —Sagira

entries.name: The Vow
entries.flavorText: "'Til death do us part." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Helm of the Ace-Defiant
entries.flavorText: “The Sindu inhabited gas giants in the spinward marches. They refused my invitation at first. As with all things, they came to see things my way.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Mask of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: The next time we meet.

entries.name: Gloves of Exaltation
entries.flavorText: "You're honest. You're true. If anyone can handle the responsibility of this power, it's you." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Pyrrhic Ascent Greaves
entries.flavorText: "If I could do everything over again, walk in my shoes a second time, I would do it all differently." —Reed-7, Exo Titan

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Mark
entries.flavorText: "Had a face like the end-times and eyes like manna in the desert. One look at him, and I knew I wasn't gonna be saved." —The Drifter

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Helmet
entries.flavorText: "How many of these damn things are there?"  —First Lieutenant Artur Voronin

entries.name: Candescent Boots
entries.flavorText: Upgrade this item using Kindling and Embers obtained during Solstice 2022.

entries.name: Channeling Treads (CODA)
entries.flavorText: A metaphysical brace: for one who seeks answers about the Dark.

entries.name: Shadow's Robes
entries.flavorText: "Nothing. Nothing can stop us. You and I are pillars of this existence, and shall be until all comes crashing down." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Wild Hunt Grasps
entries.flavorText: Strike like a serpent.

entries.name: Lingering Dread
entries.flavorText: We are all burdened by the chains of our past.

entries.name: Opulent Scholar Robes
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen what must fall so the Empire may rise. Your mastery of knowledge apocryphal shall make true Cabal of us all." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Solstice Gloves (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Payback Redux mission, defeat enemies with Arc melee abilities, and complete Heroic strikes.

entries.name: Ketchkiller's Boots
entries.flavorText: "Cut anchor if things get messy. There's always another score." —Drifter

entries.name: Tymbal Lucidae
entries.flavorText: I've retraced my steps a hundred times searching for a memory.

entries.name: Illuminus Cloak (Majestic)
entries.flavorText:
During Solstice 2021:
- Complete Glory Rank playlist activities, Nightfall strikes, or matches in Trials of Osiris.
- Collect Solar Elemental Orbs in the European Aerial Zone activity.
- Defeat powerful Cabal.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Boots
entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.name: The Queenbreaker
entries.flavorText: Despite the Breakers' treachery, Her Majesty still stands.

entries.name: Strides of Ascendancy
entries.flavorText: "You said we'd dance through time—reel through realities—together. You can't stop now." —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Wild Hunt Bond
entries.flavorText: Remember your oath.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Vestments
entries.flavorText: "Found a hallway, full of statues of Calus in various states of dissection. Sobbing noise coming from the walls."  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 3rd Transmission

entries.name: Unfocused Arc Energy
entries.flavorText: Speak with Ikora Rey in the Tower to unlock this power.

entries.name: Salvager's Salvo
entries.flavorText: The only way out is through.

entries.name: Kairos Function Crown
entries.flavorText: "Future War Cult has an artifact they call 'The Device' which may be Vex in origin." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Solstice Mask (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Chosen Redux mission, defeat enemies with Void Energy weapons, and complete a Nightfall.

entries.name: Cinder Pinion Grasps
entries.flavorText: Ikora Rey still holds the record for most consecutive victories in the Crucible. No one else has come close.

entries.name: Kairos Function Boots
entries.flavorText: "If the Vex had achieved what we would call 'time travel,' surely none of us would now exist." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Canis Major
entries.flavorText: "The stars roar with violent destruction. Channel their astral rage." —Ylaia, Awoken Techeun

entries.name: Tattered Titan Mark
entries.flavorText: It is customary to shed a mark after victory or loss—to remind its finder of the history that came before.

entries.name: One Thousand Voices
entries.flavorText: I can be anyone you wish, o murderer mine.

entries.name: Shadow's Bond
entries.flavorText: “The Fulminator could directly afflict the nervous system of the organics around her. She was pain in all its shades. I will miss her.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Bond of the Emperor's Minister
