entries.flavorText: For the Warlock possessed of Ghaul's wisdom.

entries.name: Phobos Warden Plate
entries.flavorText: "The Traveler protects us, and we will protect you." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Mind Shard
entries.flavorText: Get there quicker than thought.

entries.name: Calamity Rig Strides
entries.flavorText: "They say you can't run from what's coming. They obviously haven't seen old Drifter turn on the jets." —The Drifter

entries.name: Aeon Soul
entries.flavorText: "We are unique emanations of the same shared Light." —Cult of the Aeons

entries.name: Illuminus Strides (Majestic)
entries.flavorText:
During Solstice 2021:
- Complete public events on Europa or Battlegrounds from Season of the Chosen.
- Collect Arc or Stasis Elemental Orbs in strike, Crucible, or Gambit playlists.
- Defeat combatants with melee attacks while using an Arc subclass.

entries.name: Mihaylova's Tale
entries.flavorText: "What you fight for is what you value. Everything else is words."

entries.name: Starfire Protocol
entries.flavorText: 13.4 billion years ago, the first stars kindled out of darkness, seeding the future of all life.

entries.name: Last of the Legion
entries.flavorText:
“Vex technology on Mercury. Energy on Mars. This system is rich in spoils if one knows where to look.” 
—Val Ca'uor

entries.name: Heir Apparent
entries.flavorText: "The Red Legion will march again." —Caiatl

entries.name: Boots of Ascendancy
entries.flavorText: "I've chosen my path. Can you say the same?" —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Bond
entries.flavorText: "Had a face like the end-times and eyes like manna in the desert. One look at him, and I knew I wasn't gonna be saved." —The Drifter

entries.name: Qiao's Grin
entries.flavorText: "Let the outside mirror what is found on the inside."

entries.name: Traveler's Judgment 5
entries.flavorText:
A visitor ignites the sky, and in the truth of light it dreams:
Above the dead and yet-to-die, a legion's blade with fire screams.

entries.name: Adjudicator
entries.flavorText: "Hesitation kills." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Bond of Remembrance
entries.flavorText: To sharpen our senses when we return.

entries.name: Piece of Mind
entries.flavorText: With words or weapons, inaccuracy can be fatal.

entries.name: Penumbral Mark
entries.flavorText: "The key is to realize the future isn't an enemy to be fought. It's a friend to embrace. A closing of the circle. At last—the right to be last." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Solstice Strides (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Reach "Legend" Crucible Rank.

entries.name: Cloak of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be renowned.

entries.name: Brass Attacks
entries.flavorText: "If looks could kill, you wouldn't even have to aim this thing." —Banshee-44

entries.name: Ketchkiller's Strides
entries.flavorText: "Keep two knives in your belt, in case you can't get your point across with one." —Spider

entries.name: Turris Shade Mark
entries.flavorText: "This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. And they should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Arbalest
entries.flavorText: "We didn't have linear fusions in the Dark Age. But we made it work." —The Drifter

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Grips
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes the difference between survival and eradication is just pure, simple stubbornness." —The Drifter

entries.name: Gensym Knight Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Remember, the universe is a chaotic system. This frippery won't protect you from the continuum." —Asher Mir

entries.name: Lightkin Robes
entries.flavorText: "I once defended this city from the Fallen. As did many Lights no longer with us today. Now these walls shelter the House of Light. I could be bitter… but there's something poetic in that." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Penumbral Cloak
entries.flavorText: "When we find my lost worlds and open their knowledge to this system, the end will find us. At last—the right to be last." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Resonant Fury Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: Yul yearns for nurture. It does so through honesty.

entries.name: Shadow's Gloves
entries.flavorText: "With my knowledge of the future and all that you've seen and done… The wisdom borne of it… What can stop us at the end of all things?" —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Solstice Mark (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Homecoming Redux mission, defeat enemies with Arc Power weapons, and defeat enemies.

entries.name: Gauntlets of Rull
entries.flavorText: “Calus had won. But he took nothing from us. Instead he gave us everything we needed to end our perpetual war.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.

entries.name: Gauntlets of the Emperor's Champion
entries.flavorText: I will be the last light to go out at the party.

entries.name: Solstice Robes (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete the "Leviathan" raid on Prestige difficulty.

entries.name: Noble Constant Mark
entries.flavorText: Where you stand, they will fall.

entries.name: Apostate
entries.flavorText: "Survival is our most holy writ. Heterodoxy will be its own undoing." —Kuldax

entries.name: Sealed Ahamkara Grasps
entries.flavorText: Plating the Ahamkara bones in silver helps to quiet the auditory hallucinations… o bearer mine.

entries.name: Praefectus Robes
entries.flavorText: "Many victories seem out of reach. But you march onward, step by step, wound after wound, until they are in your grasp." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Renewal Grasps
entries.flavorText: The frigid will renewed, resurgent.

entries.name: Mihaylova's Triumph
entries.flavorText: "Think. And keep thinking. Stay seven thoughts ahead, always."

entries.name: The Stag
entries.flavorText: Only bones for your feast. Only death for my victory.

entries.name: Forerunner
entries.flavorText: A new chapter for an old legend.

entries.name: Resonant Fury Mark
entries.flavorText: Eir yearns for nurture. It does so through order.

entries.name: Vest of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be daring.

entries.name: Cloak of Remembrance
entries.flavorText: To inspire our wards with a practiced flourish.

entries.name: Gauntlets of the Emperor's Champion
entries.flavorText: I will be the last light to go out at the party.

entries.name: Gauntlets of Rull
entries.flavorText: “Calus had won. But he took nothing from us. Instead he gave us everything we needed to end our perpetual war.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.

entries.name: Boots of the Fulminator
entries.flavorText: “What was she? A creature of the Light? Or the other end of the spectrum? The Councilors never finished their analysis.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Boots of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: It's all for the sake of appearances.

entries.name: Penumbral Bond
entries.flavorText: "For when the end comes, you and I shall welcome it. And all our good works will bear fruit. At last—the right to be last." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Opulent Stalker Strides
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the apex of your slaying potential. Should you wish it, this system shall die—from the inside—and make way for what's coming. O champion mine." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Assassin's Cowl
entries.flavorText: Now you see me. Now you don't.

entries.name: Telesto
entries.flavorText: Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.

entries.name: Swashbuckler Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who like wind in their sails.

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Hood
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We threw ourselves on the blades of tyranny so others may live free." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Tarnished Mettle
entries.flavorText: Survival is the better part of valor.

entries.name: Hardy's Control
entries.flavorText: "You know what I believe? Whatever I can get my hands on."

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Cloak
entries.flavorText: V - You are bound.

entries.name: Deathbringer
entries.flavorText: "Sing them a lullaby of death and nothing more."

entries.name: Vest of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: You don't realize that I'm all around you.

entries.name: Vest of the Ace-Defiant
entries.flavorText: “The Ace-Defiant burned his mind to fly my golden ship. Being a Loyalist costs you. Being a Shadow costs dearly.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Cowl
entries.flavorText: "How many of these damn things are there?"  —First Lieutenant Artur Voronin

entries.name: Sovereign Order
entries.flavorText: Do not fly so far that you can no longer hear her voice.

entries.name: Stronghold
entries.flavorText: I am a shield unto myself.

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Helmet
entries.flavorText: "They are an insult, a stain that's our duty to wash away." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Gunslinger
entries.flavorText: A lone wolf who lives for the perfect shot.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Greaves
entries.flavorText: "The Awoken have been bleeding territories for years now. Tangled Shore was just the first to slip between the cracks." —The Spider

entries.name: Opulent Scholar Hood
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the victories that your wisdom shall win in my name. Over and over." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Illuminus Grasps (Majestic)
entries.flavorText:
During Solstice 2021: 
- Complete Altars of Sorrow on the Moon, or Override missions from Season of the Splicer.
- Gain elemental empowerment buffs by collecting Elemental Orbs.
- Defeat combatants with Void weapons.

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Boots
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We crossed a burning world with sword in hand, bringing justice and blood." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Perfect Paradox
entries.flavorText:
A tale that's different from the rest: the thread unfurls against the clocks.
The one the Speaker loved the best must have a perfect paradox.

entries.name: Kairos Function Mark
entries.flavorText: "Some speculate that the radiolarian fluid is the last vestige of a biological life-form that became the Vex." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Mask
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We threw ourselves on the blades of tyranny so others may live free." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Peregrine Greaves
entries.flavorText: Victory from on high.

entries.name: Pathfinder's Robe
entries.flavorText: Forged from the reinforced armor of fallen Corsairs to honor memories that they no longer can.

entries.name: Jurassic Green
entries.flavorText: "'Monster' is a relative term. Just look at the Drifter."  —Glint

entries.name: Scatterhorn Mark
entries.flavorText: "Lost things have a way of washing up on the Tangled Shore." —The Spider

entries.name: Raiju's Harness
entries.flavorText: To tame that which knows no master, one must bear the storm.

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Greaves
entries.flavorText: "Meet them head-on. Let us see whose Light burns more brightly." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Fire and Forget
entries.flavorText: Remove what brings you pain.

entries.name: Stochastic Variable
entries.flavorText: "However certain we are of our simulations, they always contain an element of unpredictability." —Lakshmi-2

entries.name: Solstice Hood (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Chosen Redux mission, defeat enemies with Void Energy weapons, and complete a Nightfall.

entries.name: Helm of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be strategic.

entries.name: Opulent Stalker Cloak
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the end of all things. The novenary, the Awoken Queen, the sad, strange little man on his rickety boat. They believe they've seen the same. What they don't know shall destroy them." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Scatterhorn Mask
entries.flavorText: "Since the Scatter, nowhere in the Reef felt like home. Before I knew it, I found myself on the Shore." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz

entries.name: Veles-X
entries.flavorText: Control the flanks and the battle is yours.

entries.name: Wild Hunt Mark
entries.flavorText: Show your pride.

entries.name: Bond of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be respected.

entries.name: The Huckleberry
entries.flavorText: Nothin' in the world that 30 rounds can't solve.

entries.name: Solstice Robes (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the 1AU Redux mission, defeat enemies with Solar grenades, and win non-private Crucible matches.

entries.name: BrayTech Winter Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Not every piece of equipment is optimal for all environments. You see snow. I see a thousand hiding places." —Designer, BrayTech R&D

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Plate
entries.flavorText: III - You are hollowed.

entries.name: BrayTech Sn0Boots
entries.flavorText: "Nonslip techno treads for maximum arctic mobility."

entries.name: Turris Shade Plate
entries.flavorText: A little stronger. A more powerful stance. You are almost ready… to cast a Shadow. —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Strides of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be swift.

entries.name: Pyrrhic Ascent Vestment
entries.flavorText: "I hold faith in the Light, unwavering."—Shayura, Awoken Warlock

entries.name: Insigne Shade Cover
entries.flavorText: "You have truly grown fat from strength. And you are still as wise as ever. Magnificent." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Mark of Remembrance
entries.flavorText: To remind the flock that they are not forgotten.

entries.name: Speed Metal Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who are pretty and pretty dangerous.

entries.name: Resonant Fury Cowl
entries.flavorText: I see the task before me. I wear it with devotion.

entries.name: Dawn Chorus
entries.flavorText: "Go out in a blaze of glory." —Ancient Earth proverb

entries.name: Pathfinder's Pants
entries.flavorText: Step without ground. Leap without falling. Fly without wind.

entries.name: Solstice Vest (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the 1AU Redux mission, defeat enemies with Solar Power weapons, and win non-private Crucible matches.

entries.name: Robes of Transcendence
entries.flavorText: "Do you think this makes you better than us?" —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Calamity Rig Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "The signs are always there, if you know what to look for. Most folks don't." —The Drifter

entries.name: Cuirass of the Falling Star
entries.flavorText: The lightning from the farthest cloud strikes the hardest.

entries.name: Hollow Denial
entries.flavorText: "Never forget what is taken from you."

entries.name: Ketchkiller's Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Keep a radio hidden on you… and hope you never need it." —Spider

entries.name: Severance Enclosure
entries.flavorText: The loop is made. Over and over until the collision. At that moment, severed fission.

entries.name: Arcstrider
entries.flavorText: Flow like lightning. Strike like thunder.

entries.name: Robes of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "There was a sixth Light. He cut me and I cut him, but I had more arms. He fell in pieces." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: Phobos Warden Vest
entries.flavorText: "The Traveler protects us, and we will protect you." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Solstice Cloak (Magnificent)
entries.flavorText: Defeat the final boss in Altars of Sorrow.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "For starlight was my mother, and my father was the dark." —Queen Mara Sov

entries.name: Grips of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "There's something very settling about sleeping atop a pile of my own spent rounds." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Grips
entries.flavorText: "Certainty is our greatest asset. Without it, we're nothing but shots in the dark." —Lakshmi-2

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Plate
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We rose from the ashes of a dying world to save humanity from itself." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Kairos Function Grips
entries.flavorText: "Vex structures on Venus and Mercury predate the Golden Age, and possibly Humanity itself." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Igneous Hammer
entries.flavorText: Forged by fire and might.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Greaves
entries.flavorText: "Psychometer says we're reaching dangerous levels of cognitive saturation here. We need to pull back."  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 4th Transmission

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Boots
entries.flavorText: "We're notifying fireteam members and life partners as we identify the Ghost remains. It's going to take a while."  —Vanguard Security Report Excerpt

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Vest
entries.flavorText: "Jumpship logs indicate she visited Venus, the Moon, the Reef, and several locations on Earth. Her last position before surrendering herself was Mars." —Vanguard Security Report Excerpt

entries.name: Witherhoard
entries.flavorText: "Like a one-man private security company." —The Drifter

entries.name: Unfocused Void Energy
entries.flavorText: Speak with Ikora Rey in the Tower to unlock this power.

entries.name: Drang
entries.flavorText: Since the Collapse, these pistols have been retooled several times to boost their firepower. A worn inscription reads, "To Victor, from Sigrun."

entries.name: Rat King
entries.flavorText: We are small, but we are legion.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Strides
entries.flavorText: "Psychometer says we're reaching dangerous levels of cognitive saturation here. We need to pull back."  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 4th Transmission

entries.name: Mask of Righteousness
entries.flavorText: "Why must I be wrong for you to be right?" —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Mark
entries.flavorText: "You can't leave me. Not like this." —First Lieutenant Artur Voronin

entries.name: Plate of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "Rull threatens, but he'll fall in line. The Clipse just don't like to lose." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: Resonant Fury Mark
entries.flavorText: Eir yearns for nurture. It does so through order.

entries.name: Anarchy
entries.flavorText: "Stick to wall, ground, human… then FFFFFRRRRRYYYYY! Hehehehehehehe." —Siviks, Lost to None

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Mark
entries.flavorText: "With the Consensus disbanded, there's no telling how long this could take to go to trial. Given the current… situation? We might all be dead before that happens."  —Vanguard Security Report Excerpt

entries.name: Khepri's Horn
entries.flavorText: "I pushed the sun. I can push you, too." —Inscription inside the helm

entries.name: Mark of Remembrance
entries.flavorText: To remind the flock that they are not forgotten.

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: II - You are held.

entries.name: Contraverse Hold
entries.flavorText: "Nothing is free. I know that. Therefore, he knows it too. If our places were swapped, he would do the same." —Tomek I

entries.name: Resonant Fury Grips
entries.flavorText: I touch the void, and through this clasp, I learn to hold nothing.

entries.name: Illicit Reaper Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Titan?

entries.name: Eyes of Tomorrow
entries.flavorText: "I want to see it all, unhindered, and know it's mine to take." —Clovis Bray

entries.name: Unfocused Arc Energy
entries.flavorText: Speak with Ikora Rey in the Tower to unlock this power.

entries.name: The Took Offense
entries.flavorText: This armor may not be as thick as rhino hide, but it does smell better. That's something.

entries.name: BrayTech Survival Mitts
entries.flavorText: "Stand over here. Stick your arm out. Yes, perfect. OK, just hold still…" —Production Lead, BrayTech R&D

entries.name: Scatterhorn Hood
entries.flavorText: "Since the Scatter, nowhere in the Reef felt like home. Before I knew it, I found myself on the Shore." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz

entries.name: The Vision
entries.flavorText: Glory in the damage the right blast can do.

entries.name: Bastion
entries.flavorText: "The final stand is wherever I plant my feet. Not one step more." —Saint-14

entries.name: Wing Contender
entries.flavorText: The double-headed phoenix that fights itself represents Guardians who strengthen each other in the Crucible.

entries.name: Athrys's Embrace
entries.flavorText: "There is no warrior fiercer than one shielding hatchlings from harm."  —Eliksni proverb

entries.name: unsecured/OUTCRY
entries.flavorText: COMPILING latest [θ] intelligence… Insufficient justification to pursue present action…

entries.name: Ada-1's Lone Wolf
entries.flavorText: "It's an old-fashioned oxymoron. There is no such thing. But, you must admit, there is something charming about old fashions…" —Ada-1

entries.name: Ódrerir
entries.flavorText: "Kinsmen to kinsmen should be true." —The Saga of Olaf Haraldson

entries.name: Resonant Fury Bond
entries.flavorText: I reach for nothing. I am subdued. I shall remain useless.

entries.name: Sanguine Alchemy
entries.flavorText: There is power in blood.

entries.name: Antaeus Wards
entries.flavorText: Do you believe in the Gaiaforms, the energies within planets?

entries.name: Verity's Brow
entries.flavorText:
"The Hive do not see how we see. They look beyond, into the infinite. Into the dark."

—Eris Morn

entries.name: Shattered Cipher
entries.flavorText: All doors open before you.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Gloves
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes the difference between survival and eradication is just pure, simple stubbornness." —The Drifter

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Gloves
entries.flavorText: Not far now.

entries.name: Opulent Duelist Helm
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the victories that your strength shall win in my name. Over and over." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Strides
entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.name: Nightstalker
entries.flavorText: Draw from the Void. Light the way.

entries.name: Blast Battue
entries.flavorText: "Yes, you got the kill, but the pelt is ruined." —Devrim Kay

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Bond
entries.flavorText: "Had a face like the end-times and eyes like manna in the desert. One look at him, and I knew I wasn't gonna be saved." —The Drifter

entries.name: Notorious Reaper Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Titan?

entries.name: Illicit Reaper Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Titan?

entries.name: Outlawed Reaper Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Titan?

entries.name: Wing Discipline
entries.flavorText: The double-headed phoenix that fights itself represents Guardians who strengthen each other in the Crucible.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Hauberk
entries.flavorText: "There is a place where we can remember who we are." —Imogen Rife

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Pants
entries.flavorText: Searching for here and now.

entries.name: Shadow's Mind
entries.flavorText: "The mysteries of the universe lie before you. Unresolved. Threatening. You and I will face them together. As true Cabal." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Equitis Shade Cloak
entries.flavorText: "This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. They should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: The Scholar
entries.flavorText: You can't pull an all-nighter when the sun never sets.

entries.name: Cartesian Coordinate
entries.flavorText: Where does one end and the other begin?

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Handguards
entries.flavorText: II - You are held.

entries.name: The Number
entries.flavorText: "Ah, but which number? Why it and no others?" —Lakshmi-2

entries.name: Solstice Bond (Scorched)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Payback Redux mission, collect Void orbs, and complete patrols.

entries.name: Code Duello
entries.flavorText: An unfinished inscription runs along the barrel: "Tlamus, she who—"

entries.name: Deep Explorer Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "We've progressed into a liminal space. Corridors folding on each other. Psychometer is spiking here, are we sure this is safe?" —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 2nd Transmission

entries.name: Unfocused Arc Energy
entries.flavorText: Speak with Ikora Rey in the Tower to unlock this power.

entries.name: Eriana's Vengeance
entries.flavorText: "Wei… I will see you again. But first… I have work to do." —Eriana-3, before entering the Hellmouth

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Robes
entries.flavorText: Bereft of guidance and sanctuary.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "For starlight was my mother, and my father was the dark." —Queen Mara Sov

entries.name: Restless Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who were torn from the tomb.

entries.name: Ghost Primus
entries.flavorText: The Ghost Primus was strong because of his disfigurement, not in spite of it. He alone had the vision to share my dream of a new, perfect world. Ghaul was a creature of singular beauty, and I loved him.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Had a face like the end-times and eyes like manna in the desert. One look at him, and I knew I wasn't gonna be saved." —The Drifter

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Helm
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Insigne Shade Gloves
entries.flavorText: "Warrior-scholars. Reality breakers. Weapons of mass destruction. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Mask
entries.flavorText: "When I look at them, I see myself staring back." —Crow

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Plate
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes it's a cosmic event. Sometimes it's a beast from hell. Sometimes it's one man." —The Drifter

entries.name: Kairos Function Bond
entries.flavorText: "Some speculate that the radiolarian fluid is the last vestige of a biological life-form that became the Vex." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Eye of Another World
entries.flavorText: When the universe conspires, its enemies cannot hide.

entries.name: Nezarec's Sin
entries.flavorText: "He is that which is an end. And he shall rise again." —passage from Of Hated Nezarec, a pre-Golden Age text.

entries.name: Skull of Dire Ahamkara
entries.flavorText: Reality is the finest flesh, oh bearer mine. And are you not…hungry?

entries.name: Crown of Tempests
entries.flavorText: Mighty are they of the stormcloud thrones, and quick to anger, but bounteous to those whom they love.

entries.name: Igneous Hammer (Adept)
entries.flavorText: Forged by fire and might.

entries.name: Kairos Function Mark
entries.flavorText: "Some speculate that the radiolarian fluid is the last vestige of a biological life-form that became the Vex." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: No Reprieve
entries.flavorText: Sometimes mercy is worse.

entries.name: Edge of Action
entries.flavorText: An echo of an ancient weapon, forged from a memory of strength.

entries.name: Boots of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "The fiercest Light emerged from the tangle of the web grenade. The amethyst divider on his helmet gleamed with rage. I was gone by then. I'm no fool." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: Pyrrhic Ascent Vest
entries.flavorText: "When you lose your faith, you lose a part of yourself." —Aisha, Human Hunter

entries.name: Apex Predator
entries.flavorText: Is it you or I that tops the food chain, o challenger mine?

entries.name: Wild Hunt Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: Strike relentlessly.

entries.name: Winter Lotus Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who celebrate the many traditions of the Dawning.

entries.name: Robes of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be ruthless.

entries.name: Sunbreaker
entries.flavorText: Forge the fury of undying suns.

entries.name: Equitis Shade Rig
entries.flavorText: "A little faster. A little more lethal. You are almost ready… to cast a Shadow." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Gensym Knight Mark
entries.flavorText: "Remember, the universe is a chaotic system. This frippery won't protect you from the continuum." —Asher Mir

entries.name: BrayTech Researcher's Robes
entries.flavorText: I tend to work better while not freezing to death.

entries.name: Recurrent Impact
entries.flavorText: It's enough to drive someone out of their mind.

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Greaves
entries.flavorText: "I've traveled far and weathered much. How far and how much, I don't know. All I know is I'm not done yet." —Micah-10

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Plate
entries.flavorText: "There is a place where we can remember who we are." —Imogen Rife

entries.name: ACD/0 Feedback Fence
entries.flavorText: The Active Contact Defense system uses warsat hull materials to store a retaliatory charge.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Strides
entries.flavorText: "The Awoken have been bleeding territories for years now. Tangled Shore was just the first to slip between the cracks." —The Spider

entries.name: Candescent Robes
entries.flavorText: Upgrade this item using Kindling and Embers obtained during Solstice 2022.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Strides
entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.name: Crushing Plate (CODA)
entries.flavorText: A forceful bust: for one who seeks answers about the Dark.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Bond
entries.flavorText: "Lost things have a way of washing up on the Tangled Shore." —The Spider

entries.name: Turris Shade Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "Leaders. Elite infantry. Martial teachers. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: One-Eyed Mask
entries.flavorText: An eye for an eye.

entries.name: Compass Rose
entries.flavorText: "Let the Light be your compass." —Mithrax

entries.name: Leviathan's Breath
entries.flavorText: "Cast a Shadow over the wilds of this universe. Return with glorious trophies." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Spirit of the Warmind
entries.flavorText: The weight of the world.

entries.name: Greaves of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "Under Calus, this system will unite. And when the end comes, we'll be ready. All of us." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: Gloves of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be lethal.

entries.name: Wormhusk Crown
entries.flavorText: We strive to know infinity, and sharpen our minds on the whetstone of the impossible.

entries.name: Channeling Cowl (CODA)
entries.flavorText: A metaphysical skull: for one who seeks answers about the Dark.

entries.name: Cloudstrike
entries.flavorText: They return to moons devoid. Their eyes searching. It's just begun. Meet this storm of sound and fury, till thunder-clashes fade to silence.

entries.name: Pathfinder's Chestplate
entries.flavorText: Forged from the reinforced armor of fallen Corsairs to carry the burden that they no longer can.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Helmet
entries.flavorText: "Initial entry matches the Guardian's description, a… theater? Psychometer is picking up weird background noise here." —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 1st Transmission

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Hood
entries.flavorText: "Her jumpship was full of dead Ghosts. Some of them were just pieces. We haven't determined how many dead, yet." —Vanguard Security Report Excerpt

entries.name: Deep Explorer Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "We've progressed into a liminal space. Corridors folding on each other. Psychometer is spiking here, are we sure this is safe?" —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 2nd Transmission

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Gloves
entries.flavorText: "We believe she's also responsible for the dead Guardian and Eliksni we found on Venus. We haven't identified which dead Ghost belongs to the Guardian." —Vanguard Security Report Excerpt

entries.name: Insigne Shade Robes
entries.flavorText: A little bolder. A little more focus. You are almost ready… to cast a Shadow. —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Grips
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes the difference between survival and eradication is just pure, simple stubbornness." —The Drifter

entries.name: Mark of Remembrance
entries.flavorText: To remind the flock that they are not forgotten.

entries.name: Greaves of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be immovable.

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Plate
entries.flavorText: "Jumpship logs indicate she visited Venus, the Moon, the Reef, and several locations on Earth. Her last position before surrendering herself was Mars." —Vanguard Security Report Excerpt

entries.name: Shadow Price
entries.flavorText: A precision Auto Rifle left behind by Toland, the Shattered. It asks so little, and it offers so much.

entries.name: Unfocused Void Energy
entries.flavorText: Speak with Ikora Rey in the Tower to unlock this power.

entries.name: Solstice Cloak (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Homecoming Redux mission, defeat enemies with Arc Supers, and complete challenges.

entries.name: Aisha's Embrace
entries.flavorText: Fill my wounds with molten gold and make me whole again.

entries.name: Kairos Function Vest
entries.flavorText: "Multiple analyses confirm: the milky radiolarian fluid found in Vex chassis is organic in nature." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Candescent Greaves
entries.flavorText: Upgrade this item using Kindling and Embers obtained during Solstice 2022.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Greaves
entries.flavorText: "Psychometer says we're reaching dangerous levels of cognitive saturation here. We need to pull back."  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 4th Transmission

entries.name: Opulent Scholar Robes
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen what must fall so the Empire may rise. Your mastery of knowledge apocryphal shall make true Cabal of us all." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Grips of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "There's something very settling about sleeping atop a pile of my own spent rounds." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer

entries.name: BrayTech Combat Vest
entries.flavorText: "Agility. Protection. I have always subscribed to the idea that armor is useless without both." —Lead Engineer, BrayTech R&D

entries.name: Pyrrhic Ascent Plate
entries.flavorText: "I have died for my fireteam, but I never once thought to live for them." —Reed-7, Exo Titan

entries.name: Kairos Function Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "Vex structures on Venus and Mercury predate the Golden Age, and possibly Humanity itself." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Pathfinder's Legguards
entries.flavorText: Keep moving. Find the others. Stay alive.

entries.name: Wraps of the Fulminator
entries.flavorText: “Before my Councilors and I could finalize her containment armor, the very presence of the Fulminator assaulted the senses. She was breathtaking.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Wraps of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: There is nothing I cannot forgive.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes the difference between survival and eradication is just pure, simple stubbornness." —The Drifter

entries.name: Trackless Waste
entries.flavorText: "No footprints out here." —Olu Alderdice

entries.name: Traitor's Fate
entries.flavorText: Let the Emperor's gratitude end your foes as swiftly as you have ended his.

entries.name: Noble Constant Mark
entries.flavorText: Where you stand, they will fall.

entries.name: Solstice Gloves (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Payback Redux mission, defeat enemies with Arc melee abilities, and complete Heroic strikes.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Greaves
entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.name: Two-Tailed Fox
entries.flavorText: Adorably murderous.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Bond
entries.flavorText: "Wasn't the exit this way?"  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition Log Final Transmission

entries.name: Komodo-4FR
entries.flavorText: I await the perfect moment and watch my enemies decay.

entries.name: Headpiece of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: Are you just a phantom in a mirror?

entries.name: Mask of the Fulminator
entries.flavorText: “How does one convince a creature of pure, sentient energy to pledge her loyalty? The agency to leave home is intoxicating for anyone.” — Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Grips
entries.flavorText: Not far now.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Tabard
entries.flavorText: "There is a place where we can remember who we are." —Imogen Rife

entries.name: Zenith of Your Kind
entries.flavorText: "Earth has no Shadow. Not yet." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Robes
entries.flavorText: Surrounded by shadows.

entries.name: Equitis Shade Grips
entries.flavorText: "Ace pilots. Assassination squads. Swift thieves in the night. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Winds of Change
entries.flavorText: "You can't tell the breeze where to blow. All you can do is sit back and see where it takes you."  —Amanda Holliday

entries.name: Corsair's Wrath
entries.flavorText: "We are only briefly Awoken. The rest of existence is an eternal dream." —Sedia

entries.name: Centerfire
entries.flavorText: "I still prefer the Eliksni method of scrapworking. But I admit that the Guardians' ships are very… handsome." —Eido, Eliksni Scribe

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Bond
entries.flavorText: V - You are bound.

entries.name: Tyranny of Heaven
entries.flavorText: It was She that inspired me to imagine your destruction, o jailer mine.

entries.name: Equitis Shade Boots
entries.flavorText: "There has only been a single Shadow from each people I've encountered. Yet there are so many Lights, and I have so little time…" —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal.

entries.name: Patron of Lost Causes
entries.flavorText: There is a rough engraving on its side: "In Memoriam."

entries.name: Deep Explorer Strides
entries.flavorText: "Psychometer says we're reaching dangerous levels of cognitive saturation here. We need to pull back."  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 4th Transmission

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Vest
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes it's a cosmic event. Sometimes it's a beast from hell. Sometimes it's one man." —The Drifter

entries.name: Resonant Fury Boots
entries.flavorText: I sought relief. I found delight.

entries.name: Kairos Function Robes
entries.flavorText: "Multiple analyses confirm: the milky radiolarian fluid found in Vex chassis is organic in nature." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Celestine Gloves (Majestic)
entries.flavorText:
During Solstice 2021: 
- Complete Altars of Sorrow on the Moon, or Override missions from Season of the Splicer.
- Gain elemental empowerment buffs by collecting Elemental Orbs.
- Defeat combatants with Arc weapons.

entries.name: Tilt Fuse
entries.flavorText: "[whistle] With a few more revs, Zahn woulda turned this thing into the fastest bomb you never saw. Good thing for all of us he never got the chance." —Amanda Holliday

entries.name: Impact Velocity
entries.flavorText: "Captain, this conveyance's top speed is a fraction of the Exodus Black's when it crashed into Nessus!" "Try not to find out for yourself." —Failsafe

entries.name: Star-Crossed Mark
entries.flavorText: You don't even have to ask. I'd follow you to the end of the galaxy. —Wei Ning

entries.name: Khepri's Sting
entries.flavorText: The wound is not deep, but you know it exists—and that is enough.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Lost things have a way of washing up on the Tangled Shore." —The Spider

entries.name: Greaves of the Emperor's Champion
entries.flavorText: The chorus of regret must be deafening.

entries.name: Greaves of Rull
entries.flavorText: “Valus Nohr marched on our capital with a few thousand. For weeks we battered them. But the Valus. She broke us.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Gloves
entries.flavorText: "For starlight was my mother, and my father was the dark." —Queen Mara Sov

entries.name: Empathic Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who feel the Light of others.

entries.name: Notorious Sentry Robes
entries.flavorText: Courage. Your heart beats with courage.

entries.name: Penumbral Cloak
entries.flavorText: "When we find my lost worlds and open their knowledge to this system, the end will find us. At last—the right to be last." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Raiden Flux
entries.flavorText: Interfaces with synapses (or nearest equivalent) to draw electric power directly from the wearer's body.

entries.name: The Dragon's Shadow
entries.flavorText: "It is my honor." —Chalco Yong to Ikora Rey

entries.name: Shadow's Boots
entries.flavorText: "The task before us is staggering. We must unite all races and creeds. We shall win them to our side with words where we can. And with your Light where we cannot." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Solstice Mask (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Nightfall Prestige at or above the bonus threshold.

entries.name: Holdfast Bond
entries.flavorText: "I stood on that frigid cliff, watching the smoke and flames rising from the City, and made a vow. Never again."—Ikora Rey

entries.name: Graviton Forfeit
entries.flavorText: "Doesn't matter how good you are—you stay out there too long, you're not coming back. Not the same way you left, anyway." —Tevis

entries.name: Royal Chase
entries.flavorText: "If anyone asks why you're out here, just reload." —Devrim Kay

entries.name: Firefright
entries.flavorText: What's the scariest part of a firefight? The whole damn thing.

entries.name: Necrotic Grip
entries.flavorText: "To gain power, you must sacrifice. Exos have known this long before the Guardians' rise."  —Taeko-3

entries.name: Crown-Splitter
entries.flavorText: "Our enemies think themselves gods and kings. Show them the error of their ways." —Callisto Yin

entries.name: Blasphemer
entries.flavorText: "The logic is ineluctable: Those who die deserve oblivion." —Kuldax

entries.name: Wings of Sacred Dawn
entries.flavorText: There will come a day when the light will never fade.

entries.name: Starfire Protocol
entries.flavorText: 13.4 billion years ago, the first stars kindled out of darkness, seeding the future of all life.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Wasn't the exit this way?"  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition Log Final Transmission

entries.name: Qiao's Heart
entries.flavorText: "Be aware at all times of what drives those around you."

entries.name: Notorious Collector Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Titan?

entries.name: Illicit Collector Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Titan?

entries.name: Outlawed Collector Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Titan?

entries.name: Praefectus Bond
entries.flavorText: "Feast, my comrades. Torobatl may be lost, but its spirit lives on in our traditions." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Casque
entries.flavorText: "I've learned not to be ashamed of the fear. It's to be expected, given what we are." —Pavel Nolg

entries.name: Praefectus Boots
entries.flavorText: "Ghaul commanded you to die for his vanity. I ask only that you fight at my side for the empire. The choice is yours." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Eternal Warrior
entries.flavorText: Absolute, unflinching resolve.

entries.name: Geomag Stabilizers
entries.flavorText: "The hurricane will overtake you. It's inevitable. Take stability where you can get it." —Ikora Rey

entries.name: Sunstead Helm (Majestic)
entries.flavorText:
During Solstice 2021:
- Defeat 5 minibosses in the European Aerial Zone before the boss is summoned.
- Collect Elemental Orbs.
- Rapidly defeat combatants.

entries.name: Parasite
entries.flavorText: "Constant projections. Unending destruction. The will of every efficient parasite." —Savathûn's worm

entries.name: Dead Messenger
entries.flavorText: A gift for the empress who has everything.

entries.name: BrayTech Researcher's Boots
entries.flavorText: Snow is snow is snow. Right?

entries.name: Bad Juju
entries.flavorText: "If you believe your weapon wants to end all existence, then so it will." —Toland the Shattered

entries.name: Deep Explorer Boots
entries.flavorText: "Psychometer says we're reaching dangerous levels of cognitive saturation here. We need to pull back."  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 4th Transmission

entries.name: Opulent Duelist Plate
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen what must fall so the Empire may rise. Your mastery of war shall make true Cabal of us all." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Felwinter's Helm
entries.flavorText: "To survive out here, you need eyes in the back of your head." —Lord Felwinter

entries.name: Solstice Robes (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete the "Leviathan" raid on Prestige difficulty.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Casque
entries.flavorText: "I've learned not to be ashamed of the fear. It's to be expected, given what we are." —Pavel Nolg

entries.name: Path of Least Resistance
entries.flavorText: No charge greater.

entries.name: Armamentarium
entries.flavorText: For this, there is one remedy.

entries.name: Eternal Recurrence
entries.flavorText: "The faster you go, the sooner you come back around." —Jolyon Till

entries.name: Bond of the Cormorant Blade
entries.flavorText: "Paperwork." —Warlock Aunor Mahal, on the most devastating adversary of her Praxic career.

entries.name: Sentinel
entries.flavorText: Valiant heart, unwavering resolve.

entries.name: Voidwalker
entries.flavorText: Those who have stared into the Void are not bound by the laws of space and time.

entries.name: Judgment
entries.flavorText: "The greatest threat to a Guardian is another Guardian." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Gloves of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be lethal.

entries.name: Opulent Duelist Plate
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen what must fall so the Empire may rise. Your mastery of war shall make true Cabal of us all." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: SUROS Regime
entries.flavorText: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Vest
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes it's a cosmic event. Sometimes it's a beast from hell. Sometimes it's one man." —The Drifter

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Tabard
entries.flavorText: "There is a place where we can remember who we are." —Imogen Rife

entries.name: Cloak of Temptation
entries.flavorText: "What is it you want? What is this really about?" —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Vest of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be daring.

entries.name: Unauthorized Departure
entries.flavorText: Sometimes the ship chooses the pilot.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Wraps
entries.flavorText: "That's no ordinary dust. You're standing on the pulverized remnants of 1 Ceres." —Corsair Anzani Lyle

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Had a face like the end-times and eyes like manna in the desert. One look at him, and I knew I wasn't gonna be saved." —The Drifter

entries.name: Hardy's Calm
entries.flavorText: "Watch your people, mark their strengths, and be ready to call on them."

entries.name: Lightkin Bond
entries.flavorText: "My parents walked a hard road to get me to the Last City safely. They paid the price too. These Eliksni may be outsiders, but I see something familiar in 'em. Loss. Pain. Hope." —Amanda Holliday

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Casque
entries.flavorText: "I've learned not to be ashamed of the fear. It's to be expected, given what we are." —Pavel Nolg

entries.name: Hardy's Orders
entries.flavorText: "In the end we'll be known for something bigger than all of us."

entries.name: Verity's Brow
entries.flavorText:
"The Hive do not see how we see. They look beyond, into the infinite. Into the dark."

—Eris Morn

entries.name: Solstice Helm (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Chosen Redux mission, defeat enemies with Solar Supers, and complete a Nightfall.

entries.name: BrayTech Researcher's Gloves
entries.flavorText: Warm hands, warm heart.

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Bond
entries.flavorText: "Anastasia's obsession with Rasputin is holding back our work. Exos are our future. In time—and with a little push—she'll see." —Clovis Bray I

entries.name: Turris Shade Plate
entries.flavorText: A little stronger. A more powerful stance. You are almost ready… to cast a Shadow. —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Sturm
entries.flavorText: These ancient ceremonial pistols can be dated back to the early Golden Age. A faded inscription reads, "To Sigrun, from Victor."

entries.name: Sunshot
entries.flavorText: "Can't outrun the sunrise." —Liu Feng

entries.name: Mihaylova's Instruments
entries.flavorText: "Ask yourself: what are you reaching for, and what will you do to get it?"

entries.name: Trauermarsch
entries.flavorText: "The dead do not often speak. But I always listen."

entries.name: Mask of Rull
entries.flavorText: “My planet was dead. The sky poisoned by war with an extrasolar enemy in a war that continued to rage. Then Calus came.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse

entries.name: Helm of the Emperor's Champion
entries.flavorText: Looking for a quiet place to watch the end of the world.

entries.name: Solstice Bond (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Homecoming Redux mission, defeat enemies with Solar Power weapons, and defeat enemies.

entries.name: Solstice Bond (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Homecoming Redux mission, defeat enemies with Solar Power weapons, and defeat enemies.

entries.name: Kairos Function Robes
entries.flavorText: "Multiple analyses confirm: the milky radiolarian fluid found in Vex chassis is organic in nature." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Striker
entries.flavorText: At close quarters, a fist is better than any gun.

entries.name: Equitis Shade Rig
entries.flavorText: "A little faster. A little more lethal. You are almost ready… to cast a Shadow." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Deep Explorer Plate
entries.flavorText: "Found a hallway, full of statues of Calus in various states of dissection. Sobbing noise coming from the walls."  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 3rd Transmission

entries.name: Illicit Collector Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Plate of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "Rull threatens, but he'll fall in line. The Clipse just don't like to lose." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: Ketchkiller's Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "Steer your ship true, as trust is rare among the deep stars." —Mithrax

entries.name: Aeon Soul
entries.flavorText: "We are unique emanations of the same shared Light." —Cult of the Aeons

entries.name: Strides of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be swift.

entries.name: Reefborn Warbird
entries.flavorText: "Fly to the end of existence… and then come back to me." —Queen Mara Sov

entries.name: Lunafaction Boots
entries.flavorText: "I thank you for the gift of these atoms. I will use them well." —The Stoic

entries.name: Transversive Steps
entries.flavorText: Your relationship with consistent spacetime is...tenuous at best.

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Mark
entries.flavorText: "I know who I am. I am a Titan. So long as I am able, I stand between the Last City and those who would tear it down." —Saint-14

entries.name: Pathfinder's Helmet
entries.flavorText: Eyes open and keep to the horizon.

entries.name: Striker
entries.flavorText: At close quarters, a fist is better than any gun.

entries.name: Bond Judgment (CODA)
entries.flavorText: A metaphysical gift: for one who seeks answers about the Dark.

entries.name: Claws of Ahamkara
entries.flavorText: The mind is malleable, filled with transient and fleeting ideas. Let us shape it, so that you may see the infinite splendor of the universe.

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Headpiece
entries.flavorText: Trust him.

entries.name: Vest of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "The Loyalists won't be ready until every world in this system casts a Shadow. Calus will get us there." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer

entries.name: Wildwood Mark
entries.flavorText: Devrim Kay fashioned the pattern for these Guardian armor suits.

entries.name: Judgment of Kelgorath
entries.flavorText: "CARVE UNTO ME A TRIBUTE OF WAILING PRAYERS" —Xivu Arath, Hive God of War

entries.name: Solstice Vest (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the 1AU Redux mission, defeat enemies with Solar Power weapons, and win non-private Crucible matches.

entries.name: Brave Titan's Mark
entries.flavorText: A Mark meant to honor the stalwart defenders of the Last City.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Mark
entries.flavorText: "Had a face like the end-times and eyes like manna in the desert. One look at him, and I knew I wasn't gonna be saved." —The Drifter

entries.name: Mark of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "What Calus found at the black edge… when he brings it to light, there will be a reckoning unlike anything this galaxy has ever seen." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: Unforgiven
entries.flavorText: Never forget.

entries.name: Mask of Righteousness
entries.flavorText: "Why must I be wrong for you to be right?" —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Eidolon Pursuant Mark
entries.flavorText: V - You are bound.

entries.name: The Stag
entries.flavorText: Only bones for your feast. Only death for my victory.

entries.name: Solstice Bond (Magnificent)
entries.flavorText: Defeat the final boss in Altars of Sorrow.

entries.name: Kairos Function Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "Vex structures on Venus and Mercury predate the Golden Age, and possibly Humanity itself." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Mark of Shelter
entries.flavorText: Titans are both the shelter and the storm.

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Helm
entries.flavorText: "Life's all about timing. You gotta know when to pull the trigger, when to go in for the kiss, and—most of all—when to make for the exit." —Cayde-6

entries.name: Solstice Gauntlets (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Payback Redux mission, defeat enemies with Solar Energy weapons, and complete Heroic strikes.

entries.name: Opulent Scholar Boots
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the apex of your heuristic potential. Should you wish it, this system shall collapse from the ideas you've made into weapons. And make way for what's coming. O champion mine." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Lost Pacific Mark
entries.flavorText: Sloane had these Golden Age space suits repurposed for Guardian armor.

entries.name: Tatarstan
entries.flavorText: ::Everything is gone.::

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Helm
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Notorious Invader Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Titan?

entries.name: Illicit Invader Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Titan?

entries.name: Outlawed Invader Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Titan?

entries.name: Resonant Fury Mask
entries.flavorText: I see the void, and through this gaze, I learn to covet no goal.

entries.name: Iota Draconis
entries.flavorText: "The paths between stars are fractal mirrors of the neurons in our brains and the vicissitudes of our fates." —Sjari, Awoken Techeun

entries.name: Scatterhorn Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Lost things have a way of washing up on the Tangled Shore." —The Spider

entries.name: Boots of the Assembler
entries.flavorText: The manifestation of pseudophotons and impossible math.

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: Not far now.

entries.name: Greaves of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be immovable.

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Strides
entries.flavorText: "Glint says to keep moving. That's how you know something's wrong." —Crow

entries.name: Scatterhorn Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "That's no ordinary dust. You're standing on the pulverized remnants of 1 Ceres." —Corsair Anzani Lyle

entries.name: Equitis Shade Cowl
entries.flavorText: "You have truly grown fat from strength. And you are still as nimble as ever. Magnificent." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Heretic
entries.flavorText: "Death is only and forever an ending. All else is sacrilege." —Kuldax

entries.name: Deep Explorer Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Wasn't the exit this way?"  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition Log Final Transmission

entries.name: Getaway Artist
entries.flavorText: Keep the engine running.

entries.name: Sanguine Alchemy
entries.flavorText: There is power in blood.

entries.name: Opulent Scholar Gloves
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the work that will bring this system together. I'll need your wisdom." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Phobos Warden Cowl
entries.flavorText: "I'm fine. Begin the transmission."  —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Threaded Needle
entries.flavorText: "Most of our advanced tech was first used against us by alien races. Time to return the favor." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Flowing Cowl (CODA)
entries.flavorText: A mercurial skull: for one who seeks answers about the Dark.

entries.name: Curse of Foresight
entries.flavorText: "But will my actions avert the futures I see, or cause them?" —Osiris

entries.name: SV-112 Predator
entries.flavorText: And watch out—it's hungry.

entries.name: Concentric Dawn
entries.flavorText: "Study the sacred geometry of light and life." —Ikora Rey

entries.name: Shadow's Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "With my knowledge of the future and all that you've seen and done… The victories borne of it… What can stop us at the end of all things?" —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Getaway Artist
entries.flavorText: Keep the engine running.

entries.name: MIDA Mini-Tool
entries.flavorText: Select application: Flare gun. Water purifier. Interplanetary Positioning System. Encyclopædia Arcana. Personal flotation device. List continues.

entries.name: Riskrunner
entries.flavorText: Charge your soul and let the electrons sing.

entries.name: Wing Discipline
entries.flavorText: The double-headed phoenix that fights itself represents Guardians who strengthen each other in the Crucible.

entries.name: Mark of the Emperor's Champion
entries.flavorText: A gift for the Titan with Ghaul's strength.

entries.name: Shadow's Mark
entries.flavorText: “Calus could not heal our air. My planet is still dying. But as long as I serve, I have hope.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.

entries.name: Greaves of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "Under Calus, this system will unite. And when the end comes, we'll be ready. All of us." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: Praefectus Cuirass
entries.flavorText: "Many victories seem out of reach. But you march onward, step by step, wound after wound, until they are in your grasp." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Retrocausality
entries.flavorText: "This is a puzzle with missing pieces." —Elsie Bray

entries.name: Exalted Truth
entries.flavorText: "It's the end of the world. We don't have another choice." —Ikora Rey

entries.name: Retrofit Escapade
entries.flavorText: Double down for one last job.

entries.name: Temptation's Bond
entries.flavorText: "You said you'd always trust me. Trust me." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Solstice Boots (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Spark Redux mission, defeat enemies with Arc Supers, and complete adventures.

entries.name: Phobos Warden Boots
entries.flavorText: "We are deploying Guardians to all corners of the system." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Chain of Command
entries.flavorText: Bound by duty.

entries.name: Sunbreaker
entries.flavorText: Forge the fury of undying suns.

entries.name: Holiday Cheer
entries.flavorText: A twinkle in our eyes, ozone in our lungs, and a song in our hearts.

entries.name: Chill of Winter
entries.flavorText: The Dawning comes once a year. Some wish it would take a little longer.

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Helm
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We threw ourselves on the blades of tyranny so others may live free." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Penumbral Bond
entries.flavorText: "For when the end comes, you and I shall welcome it. And all our good works will bear fruit. At last—the right to be last." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Kairos Function Mark
entries.flavorText: "Some speculate that the radiolarian fluid is the last vestige of a biological life-form that became the Vex." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Tarrabah
entries.flavorText: We walk where our ancestors once walked.

entries.name: Cinder Pinion Gloves
entries.flavorText: Ikora Rey still holds the record for most consecutive victories in the Crucible. No one else has come close.

entries.name: Grips of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be precise.

entries.name: D.A.R.C.I.
entries.flavorText: Thank you for using the Data Analysis, Reconnaissance, and Cooperative Intelligence device. You may call me Darci.

entries.name: Borealis
entries.flavorText: Light is a spectrum. Why limit yourself to a single hue?

entries.name: Plate of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be brave.

entries.name: False Promises
entries.flavorText: Gripped in the hands of the desperate many.

entries.name: Judgement's Wrap
entries.flavorText: "For one who analyzes battle as the philosopher questions the universe." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Bond Relentless
entries.flavorText: "For you as much as for them. They are observing your thoughts." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Flowing Boots (CODA)
entries.flavorText: A mercurial brace: for one who seeks answers about the Dark.

entries.name: Eye of Sol
entries.flavorText: "The sun took my sight; thus, the sun became my eyes." —Parables of the Allspring

entries.name: Cloak of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "I can outshoot anybody. Even the Traveler-spawn. My mind's bigger, too." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer

entries.name: Turris Shade Greaves
entries.flavorText: "There has only ever been but a single Shadow from each people I've encountered. Yet there are so many Lights, and I have so little time…" —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal.

entries.name: Illicit Sentry Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you defend him, Titan?

entries.name: Outlawed Sentry Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you defend him, Titan?

entries.name: Notorious Sentry Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you defend him, Titan?

entries.name: Stormcaller
entries.flavorText: Harmony within, hurricane without.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Greaves
entries.flavorText: "What has been awoken can slumber no more." —Techeun Kalli

entries.name: Wild Hunt Greaves
entries.flavorText: Outrun your prey.

entries.name: Robes of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "There was a sixth Light. He cut me and I cut him, but I had more arms. He fell in pieces." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: Fractethyst
entries.flavorText: "Imagine that as the last sound you hear." —Petra Venj

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Had a face like the end-times and eyes like manna in the desert. One look at him, and I knew I wasn't gonna be saved." —The Drifter

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Strides
entries.flavorText: "What has been awoken can slumber no more." —Techeun Kalli

entries.name: Null Calamity 9
entries.flavorText:
A sacred eye that speaks in lies—upending futures in its path.
The way before us to the skies shall see itself in ancient wrath.

entries.name: BrayTech Researcher's Robes
entries.flavorText: I tend to work better while not freezing to death.

entries.name: Solstice Cloak (Scorched)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Payback Redux mission, get Super kills in the Crucible, and complete patrols.

entries.name: Unfocused Solar Energy
entries.flavorText: Speak with Ikora Rey in the Tower to unlock this power.

entries.name: Mihaylova's Path
entries.flavorText: "What you pursue, those are your values. Everything else is noise."

entries.name: Gauntlets of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be indestructible.

entries.name: Solstice Mark (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Defeat Bosses

entries.name: Izanagi's Burden
entries.flavorText: "Shame. Guilt. Fear. We all bear them. Gather your regrets, purge them as best you can. Let your enemies feel the weight of your burdens." —Ada-1

entries.name: Shadow's Gloves
entries.flavorText: "With my knowledge of the future and all that you've seen and done… The wisdom borne of it… What can stop us at the end of all things?" —Emperor Calus

entries.name: The Bandwagon
entries.flavorText:
"Because a group of coyotes is a band!" —Therin Vai
"I refuse to call it that."—Nadiya

entries.name: Xenos Vale Bond
entries.flavorText: New things are only strange until you behold them. Then they are even stranger.

entries.name: An Insurmountable Skullfort
entries.flavorText: BRAINVAULT Sigma-ACTIUM-IX Cranial Dreadnought (Invincible Type)

entries.name: Reckless Endangerment
entries.flavorText: Headlong and shortsighted.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Boots
entries.flavorText: "The Awoken have been bleeding territories for years now. Tangled Shore was just the first to slip between the cracks." —The Spider

entries.name: Nightstalker
entries.flavorText: Draw from the Void. Light the way.

entries.name: Boots of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be sure-footed.

entries.name: Infinite Paths 8
entries.flavorText:
They sowed the First, now reap the Last; forever narrows to a line
Where Light will fade into the past—when all's converted, nothing shines.

entries.name: Sunstead Gauntlets (Majestic)
entries.flavorText:
During Solstice 2021:
- Complete Altars of Sorrow on the Moon, or Override missions from Season of the Splicer.
- Gain elemental empowerment buffs by collecting Elemental Orbs.
- Defeat combatants with Solar weapons.

entries.name: Solstice Grasps (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete strikes with at least one clanmate.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Gloves
entries.flavorText: "For starlight was my mother, and my father was the dark." —Queen Mara Sov

entries.name: BrayTech Sn0Helm
entries.flavorText: Great for avoiding a brain freeze.

entries.name: Vouchsafe
entries.flavorText: "We knew it would not be easy." —Paladin Hallam Fen

entries.name: Praefectus Gloves
entries.flavorText: "You want a ship? Surely your friends in the fleet would be happy to retrieve another lost Legionary. That is, unless, you'd rather not be found…" —The Spider

entries.name: Edge of Intent
entries.flavorText: An echo of an ancient weapon, forged from a memory of cunning.

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Bond
entries.flavorText: "You can't leave me. Not like this." —First Lieutenant Artur Voronin

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Perhaps it was not the correct choice. But it was the right choice." —Yasmin Eld

entries.name: Cinder Pinion Mark
entries.flavorText: "You're angry they defeated you? They just did you a favor! Now you know what to improve." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Hood of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be wise.

entries.name: BrayTech Thermal Grips
entries.flavorText: "You think this is cold? You have no idea."

entries.name: Illicit Reaper Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you clear the way for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Peregrine Greaves
entries.flavorText: Victory from on high.

entries.name: Opulent Stalker Vest
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen what must fall so the Empire may rise. Your mastery of silent slaughter shall make true Cabal of us all." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Osmiomancy Gloves
entries.flavorText: Osmium's existence requires near-divine intervention—a supernova—to forge.

entries.name: Kairos Function Greaves
entries.flavorText: "If the Vex had achieved what we would call 'time travel,' surely none of us would now exist." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Ticuu's Divination
entries.flavorText: Three points, pushed through forever.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Gloves
entries.flavorText: "We've progressed into a liminal space. Corridors folding on each other. Psychometer is spiking here, are we sure this is safe?" —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 2nd Transmission

entries.name: Wildwood Bond
entries.flavorText: Devrim Kay fashioned the pattern for these Guardian armor suits.

entries.name: Falcon's Chase
entries.flavorText: "A shadow of a man. A glimpse of a dream."

entries.name: Deep Explorer Mask
entries.flavorText: "Initial entry matches the Guardian's description, a… theater? Psychometer is picking up weird background noise here." —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 1st Transmission

entries.name: Resonant Fury Robes
entries.flavorText: I reach for solace. It is stolen from me.

entries.name: No Backup Plans
entries.flavorText: No ammo? No problem.

entries.name: Approaching Infinity
entries.flavorText: The limit does not exist.

entries.name: Dark Horse
entries.flavorText: There's no recognizable maker's mark. Just a "1" stamped onto the side.

entries.name: Burnout
entries.flavorText: Fight fire with fire. And fight everything else with fire, too.

entries.name: The Bronco
entries.flavorText: "A man's only as good as his ride." —Tex 99-40

entries.name: Deep Explorer Helmet
entries.flavorText: "Initial entry matches the Guardian's description, a… theater? Psychometer is picking up weird background noise here." —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 1st Transmission

entries.name: The Took Offense
entries.flavorText: This armor may not be as thick as rhino hide, but it does smell better. That's something.

entries.name: Equitis Shade Boots
entries.flavorText: "There has only been a single Shadow from each people I've encountered. Yet there are so many Lights, and I have so little time…" —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal.

entries.name: Jack Queen King 3
entries.flavorText:
An army meets, and stands, and falls. Three nobles wage their hopeless war.
In shifting madness, evil crawls. One stands above the battle's roar.

entries.name: West of Sunfall 7
entries.flavorText:
A spark of knowledge with each fall, the purpose of the endless youth.
No longer shunned, dark's nameless call now brings about tenebrous truth.

entries.name: Claws of Ahamkara
entries.flavorText: The mind is malleable, filled with transient and fleeting ideas. Let us shape it, so that you may see the infinite splendor of the universe.

entries.name: Shadebinder
entries.flavorText: Reality is chaotic and unruly; bind it and bring order.

entries.name: Cuirass of the Emperor's Champion
entries.flavorText: What will we be to each other in the next life?

entries.name: Chassis of Rull
entries.flavorText: “Calus invited the Clipse to join his Loyalists. We refused, at first. So he sent a Shadow.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.

entries.name: Liar's Handshake
entries.flavorText: Look 'em in the eye.

entries.name: Twilight Oath
entries.flavorText: Engraved in illuminated letters on the weapon's chassis: THE AWOKEN MADE ME.

entries.name: Resonant Fury Robes
entries.flavorText: I reach for solace. It is stolen from me.

entries.name: Mantle of Battle Harmony
entries.flavorText: There is no strength in letting go.

entries.name: Tattered Titan Mark
entries.flavorText: It is customary to shed a mark after victory or loss—to remind its finder of the history that came before.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Perhaps it was not the correct choice. But it was the right choice." —Yasmin Eld

entries.name: Rimed Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who venture out beyond the warmth.

entries.name: Praefectus Cover
entries.flavorText: "The past is the past; we cannot return to it. All we can do now is fight for the future our people deserve, through blade and blood." —Valus Cau'tor

entries.name: Opulent Scholar Bond
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the end of all things. The novenary, the Awoken Queen, the sad, strange little man on his rickety boat. They believe they've seen the same. What they don't know will destroy them." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Binary Phoenix Cloak
entries.flavorText: The phoenix that fights itself, then rises from its ashes stronger than ever. That is the Crucible.

entries.name: Equitis Shade Grips
entries.flavorText: "Ace pilots. Assassination squads. Swift thieves in the night. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Loreley Splendor Helm
entries.flavorText:
"I don't know what it means
That I am so sad
A legend of bygone days
That I cannot keep out of my mind." —Die Lorelei, Heinrich Heine

entries.name: Thunderlord
entries.flavorText: They return from fields afar. The eye has passed, the end nears. Do not fade quietly. Let thunder reign again.

entries.name: Inaugural Address
entries.flavorText: My first act as emperor was to send the Consul into the wasteland. The golden sun would burn away his corrupt form—a fitting symbol for the revolution that was to be my reign.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Hood
entries.flavorText: "Initial entry matches the Guardian's description, a… theater? Psychometer is picking up weird background noise here." —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 1st Transmission

entries.name: Cloak of Remembrance
entries.flavorText: To inspire our wards with a practiced flourish.

entries.name: Boots of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "The fiercest Light emerged from the tangle of the web grenade. The amethyst divider on his helmet gleamed with rage. I was gone by then. I'm no fool." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: Kairos Function Helm
entries.flavorText: "Future War Cult has an artifact they call 'The Device' which may be Vex in origin." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Tarantula
entries.flavorText: No one will escape my web.

entries.name: No Reprieve
entries.flavorText: Sometimes mercy is worse.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Mark
entries.flavorText: "Had a face like the end-times and eyes like manna in the desert. One look at him, and I knew I wasn't gonna be saved." —The Drifter

entries.name: Scatterhorn Plate
entries.flavorText: "Was Wolf once. Still Wolf after Scatter, but… different. Then Queen's. Wolf again. Bannerless. Then Spider's." —Avrok

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Mark
entries.flavorText: "Perhaps it was not the correct choice. But it was the right choice." —Yasmin Eld

entries.name: Bond of Remembrance
entries.flavorText: To sharpen our senses when we return.

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Cloak
entries.flavorText: "You can't leave me. Not like this." —First Lieutenant Artur Voronin

entries.name: Shadow's Mind
entries.flavorText: "The mysteries of the universe lie before you. Unresolved. Threatening. You and I will face them together. As true Cabal." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Praefectus Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "You want a ship? Surely your friends in the fleet would be happy to retrieve another lost Legionary. That is, unless, you'd rather not be found…" —The Spider

entries.name: Mark of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be feared.

entries.name: Wild Hunt Plate
entries.flavorText: "This thing we were hunting, it was smart. Scary smart. It trapped us in the tombs below Old Chicago; picked off the other fireteams one by one." —Reed-7, Exo Titan

entries.name: The Recluse
entries.flavorText: My bite will turn your sweet flesh to vile rot.

entries.name: Mask of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "I'm a Valus before I'm a 'Shadow.' But Calus is the empire's last, best hope. His plan is my plan." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: BrayTech Combat Vest
entries.flavorText: "Agility. Protection. I have always subscribed to the idea that armor is useless without both." —Lead Engineer, BrayTech R&D

entries.name: Firecrest
entries.flavorText: Speed can be a means… or an end.

entries.name: Gauntlets of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "Do I miss my arm? I miss my empire. I would give everything to have it back. And I will." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: Wildwood Cloak
entries.flavorText: Devrim Kay fashioned the pattern for these Guardian armor suits.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Hauberk
entries.flavorText: "There is a place where we can remember who we are." —Imogen Rife

entries.name: Opulent Duelist Mark
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the end of all things. The novenary, the Awoken Queen, the sad, strange little man on his rickety boat. They believe they've seen the same. What they don't know will destroy them." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Kairos Function Grips
entries.flavorText: "Vex structures on Venus and Mercury predate the Golden Age, and possibly Humanity itself." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Lion's Pride
entries.flavorText: "With fists like those, who needs guns? Everyone else, that's who!" —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Last Flight Home
entries.flavorText: From out here, home seems very far away.

entries.name: Right Side of Wrong
entries.flavorText: Where do you stand?

entries.name: Strides of Ascendancy
entries.flavorText: "You said we'd dance through time—reel through realities—together. You can't stop now." —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Alone as a god
entries.flavorText: I am the perfect loving god, and all will tremble to know me.

entries.name: Crown of Tempests
entries.flavorText: Mighty are they of the stormcloud thrones, and quick to anger, but bounteous to those whom they love.

entries.name: Eye of Another World
entries.flavorText: When the universe conspires, its enemies cannot hide.

entries.name: Nezarec's Sin
entries.flavorText: "He is that which is an end. And he shall rise again." —passage from Of Hated Nezarec, a pre-Golden Age text.

entries.name: Qiao's Strides
entries.flavorText: "Walk in peace, and know that there can be no danger in wisdom."

entries.name: Shadow's Robes
entries.flavorText: "Nothing. Nothing can stop us. You and I are pillars of this existence, and shall be until all comes crashing down." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Sentinel
entries.flavorText: Valiant heart, unwavering resolve.

entries.name: Kairos Function Bond
entries.flavorText: "Some speculate that the radiolarian fluid is the last vestige of a biological life-form that became the Vex." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Greaves of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "Under Calus, this system will unite. And when the end comes, we'll be ready. All of us." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: Ophidia Spathe
entries.flavorText: Listen carefully when the serpent speaks, for its tongue is forked, and its words have two meanings.

entries.name: Perfect Paradox
entries.flavorText:
A tale that's different from the rest: the thread unfurls against the clocks.
The one the Speaker loved the best must have a perfect paradox.

entries.name: Insigne Shade Boots
entries.flavorText: "There has only ever been but a single Shadow from each people I've encountered. Yet there are so many Lights, and I have so little time…" —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal.

entries.name: Lightkin Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "Enemies become allies, that's just how it goes. Hell, most of my dearest friends killed me at one point or another!" —The Drifter

entries.name: Unfocused Solar Energy
entries.flavorText: Speak with Ikora Rey in the Tower to unlock this power.

entries.name: A Thousand Wings
entries.flavorText: Extinguish the stars. Devour the planets. Soar through a universe of utter dark.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Greaves
entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.name: Shadow's Plate
entries.flavorText: "Nothing. Nothing can stop us. You and I shall uphold the pillars of existence until the end comes. And when it does…" —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Resonant Fury Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: Yul yearns for nurture. It does so through honesty.
