entries.name: Resonant Fury Gloves
entries.flavorText: I see the game. I raise the stakes.

entries.name: Polaris Lance
entries.flavorText: "I've forgotten so much of my past life, of my family. But when I hold this rifle, everything feels right. I feel like… I'm home." —Ana Bray

entries.name: The Chaperone
entries.flavorText: "My mother had a shotgun we called the Chaperone. Kept us alive out there before we got to the City." —Amanda Holliday

entries.name: Lord of Wolves
entries.flavorText: By this right alone do I rule.

entries.name: Cinder Pinion Bond
entries.flavorText: "You're angry they defeated you? They just did you a favor! Now you know what to improve." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Turris Shade Mark
entries.flavorText: "This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. And they should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Mask of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be cunning.

entries.name: Motion to Compel
entries.flavorText: "Take the long view."

entries.name: Illicit Invader Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Lightkin Vest
entries.flavorText: "A shield does as much damage as a sword if it is not protecting what you hold dear." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Crimson
entries.flavorText: According to official Vanguard policy, this weapon does not exist.

entries.name: Equitis Shade Cowl
entries.flavorText: "You have truly grown fat from strength. And you are still as nimble as ever. Magnificent." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Solstice Cloak (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Defeat Bosses

entries.name: Robes of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be ruthless.

entries.name: Hood of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be wise.

entries.name: Caliban's Hand
entries.flavorText: Always keep one up your sleeve.

entries.name: Imperial Needle
entries.flavorText: Honor among foes. Glory to the vanquished.

entries.name: Duality
entries.flavorText: "The question becomes whether or not to fire, not where to aim." —Osiris

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Robes
entries.flavorText: "Were the Light a glory to be earned, the Cabal would have claimed it long ago." —Empress Caiatl

entries.name: Kairos Function Vest
entries.flavorText: "Multiple analyses confirm: the milky radiolarian fluid found in Vex chassis is organic in nature." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Wolftone Draw
entries.flavorText: "Keep the string a little loose. It's supposed to sound like that." —Petra Venj

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Cloak
entries.flavorText: "You'd think I'd understand it better than anyone, right? But I don't understand anything anymore." —Crow

entries.name: Awakened Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who rise when it's needed most.

entries.name: Lightkin Grips
entries.flavorText: "Long as they don't cross me, I'm everybody's friend. Thing is, I feel like I get crossed more'n most." —The Drifter

entries.name: Dawnblade
entries.flavorText: Spread your wings and set the sky ablaze.

entries.name: Shadow's Vest
entries.flavorText: "Nothing. Nothing can stop us. You and I shall take back the pillars of existence from the lost athenaeum worlds." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: BrayTech Iron-Heart Engine
entries.flavorText: The air is cold, but our hearts are warm.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Greaves
entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.name: The Lament
entries.flavorText: The last thing the Vex ever heard—the grinding wails of a vicious Banshee.

entries.name: Resonant Fury Vest
entries.flavorText: I feel the void, and through this experience, I learn that want is suffering.

entries.name: Chromatic Fire
entries.flavorText: "…found them… Crystal Orchards of Dione… requesting backup… coordinates to follow…" —Last transmission of Fireteam Pergamon

entries.name: Phoenix Protocol
entries.flavorText: Do not grieve the dying star. Its death kindles newer life, and thus the wheel turns again.

entries.name: Gloves of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be lethal.

entries.name: Strides of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be swift.

entries.name: Cloak of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "I can outshoot anybody. Even the Traveler-spawn. My mind's bigger, too." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer

entries.name: Lightkin Plate
entries.flavorText: "We have more in common than we may realize, or be willing to admit." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Shadow's Boots
entries.flavorText: "The task before us is staggering. We must unite all races and creeds. We shall win them to our side with words where we can. And with your Light where we cannot." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Star Jasmine
entries.flavorText: The scent emerges as the sun sets, a testimony carried through warm summer nights.

entries.name: Riis Racer
entries.flavorText: "No! This one goes here, that one goes there!" —Amanda Holliday

entries.name: Collective Obligation
entries.flavorText: "What The Witness gave me, I give to you. May it serve you in death, or in finality. It cannot be both." —Rhulk, disciple of the Witness

entries.name: BrayTech Sn0Treads
entries.flavorText: "Piecing together complex systems of causalities is the puzzle that defined me." —Elsie Bray

entries.name: Lumina
entries.flavorText: There must be meaning in my roar.

entries.name: Eternal Blazon
entries.flavorText: "But this eternal blazon must not be to ears of flesh and blood."

entries.name: Shadow's Vest
entries.flavorText: "Nothing. Nothing can stop us. You and I shall take back the pillars of existence from the lost athenaeum worlds." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Penumbral Cloak
entries.flavorText: "When we find my lost worlds and open their knowledge to this system, the end will find us. At last—the right to be last." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Equitis Shade Cowl
entries.flavorText: "You have truly grown fat from strength. And you are still as nimble as ever. Magnificent." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Radiant Accipiter
entries.flavorText: A paracausal ship. That's a new one. No navigation system, no controls, no computer on account of it responding directly to your thoughts. Not much to tinker with under the hood. Mostly because… there ain't no hood, neither.—Amanda Holliday

entries.name: Eriana's Vow
entries.flavorText: A light in the dark.

entries.name: Solstice Boots (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Spark Redux mission, defeat enemies with Arc Supers, and complete adventures.

entries.name: Outlawed Collector Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Illicit Collector Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Notorious Collector Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Warlock?

entries.name: Saint's Vocation
entries.flavorText: A new chance. A new calling.

entries.name: Arrow of Time
entries.flavorText: We must continue to move forward, even if it means aiming backward.

entries.name: Solar Sails
entries.flavorText: It's going to be a long, cold ride.

entries.name: NS81 Reprisal Sprint
entries.flavorText: "Hey, hey, don't give up! Everything you ever wanted's on the other side of tomorrow." —Cayde-6

entries.name: Waking Nightmare
entries.flavorText: "As Darkness approaches, my vision grows clearer." —Eris Morn

entries.name: Obsidian Wings
entries.flavorText: "For the day we're free." —Lord Felwinter

entries.name: Wraps of the Fulminator
entries.flavorText: “Before my Councilors and I could finalize her containment armor, the very presence of the Fulminator assaulted the senses. She was breathtaking.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Wraps of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: There is nothing I cannot forgive.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Mask
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Binary Phoenix Bond
entries.flavorText: The phoenix that fights itself, then rises from its ashes stronger than ever. That is the Crucible.

entries.name: Brave Titan's Mark
entries.flavorText: A Mark meant to honor the stalwart defenders of the Last City.

entries.name: Lion Rampant
entries.flavorText: All expect that you should rouse yourself, as did the former lions of your blood.

entries.name: Peacekeepers
entries.flavorText: Designed for the seamless delivery of justice in an unjust world.

entries.name: Headless Horsepower
entries.flavorText: "The line between myth and reality disappears when the myths start shooting back!" —Glint

entries.name: Helm of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be strategic.

entries.name: Fighting Lion
entries.flavorText: "I call it the Zhang Fei. It hits almost as hard as I do." —Wei Ning

entries.name: The Prospector
entries.flavorText: "Some things should stay buried."

entries.name: Cloak of Temptation
entries.flavorText: "What is it you want? What is this really about?" —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Robes
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes it's a cosmic event. Sometimes it's a beast from hell. Sometimes it's one man." —The Drifter

entries.name: Pleiades Corrector
entries.flavorText: "No, I don't think I'll tell you what it's for. That would be too easy." —Lakshmi-2

entries.name: Wormhusk Crown
entries.flavorText: We strive to know infinity, and sharpen our minds on the whetstone of the impossible.

entries.name: BrayTech Researcher's Boots
entries.flavorText: Snow is snow is snow. Right?

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We were forged in the fires of a burning world." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Deep Explorer Plate
entries.flavorText: "Found a hallway, full of statues of Calus in various states of dissection. Sobbing noise coming from the walls."  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 3rd Transmission

entries.name: Calamity Rig Vest
entries.flavorText: "When the ship goes down, you can't save it. You just gotta choose: go under, or swim." —The Drifter

entries.name: Bond of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be respected.

entries.name: BrayTech Survival Mitts
entries.flavorText: "Stand over here. Stick your arm out. Yes, perfect. OK, just hold still…" —Production Lead, BrayTech R&D

entries.name: Legend of Acrius
entries.flavorText: "In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabal… are not a subtle people." —Tyra Karn

entries.name: Tractor Cannon
entries.flavorText: Property of Ishtar Collective. WARNING: Gravity propulsor beam can cause serious injury or even death.

entries.name: Turris Shade Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "Leaders. Elite infantry. Martial teachers. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Kairos Function Mask
entries.flavorText: "Future War Cult has an artifact they call 'The Device' which may be Vex in origin." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Illicit Collector Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Outlawed Collector Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Notorious Collector Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Lost Pacific Mark
entries.flavorText: Sloane had these Golden Age space suits repurposed for Guardian armor.

entries.name: Undefeated
entries.flavorText: Marcus Ren's record is unassailable. It would take decades for anyone to catch him.

entries.name: Undeterred
entries.flavorText: Hard work and practice aren't enough. Sometimes things need to break your way.

entries.name: Le Monarque
entries.flavorText: "Wings flutter. Beauty distracts. Poison injects. The butterfly's curse extends to your enemies. A short life, shortened further by your hand." —Ada-1

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Mark
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We crushed the Warlords beneath our heel so that they may never rise again." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Robes of the Fulminator
entries.flavorText: “The Councilors devised a way for the Fulminator to escape her interstellar ark, to the outrage of her people.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Robes of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: Repentance has its rewards.

entries.name: The Time-Worn Spire
entries.flavorText: Forged in honor of Silimar, and persistence in the face of impossible odds.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Gloves
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes the difference between survival and eradication is just pure, simple stubbornness." —The Drifter

entries.name: Cinder Pinion Plate
entries.flavorText: "Your Light is a flame, Guardian. Kindle it, and hear it roar." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Bond
entries.flavorText: "Perhaps it was not the correct choice. But it was the right choice." —Yasmin Eld

entries.name: Bucca's Jollyboat
entries.flavorText: Blood in the forecastle, and the captain can't be found.

entries.name: Solstice Hood (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Chosen Redux mission, defeat enemies with Void Energy weapons, and complete a Nightfall.

entries.name: Plate of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be brave.

entries.name: Solstice Bond (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Defeat Bosses

entries.name: Mark Relentless
entries.flavorText: "For you as much as it is for them. They seek to observe your absolute force." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Mark Judgment
entries.flavorText: "A signifier of force." —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Unwavering Duty
entries.flavorText: "There's no one else I can trust with her care." —Ikora Rey

entries.name: Ophidian Aspect
entries.flavorText: "Have I the aspic in my lips?"

entries.name: Phoenix's Fire
entries.flavorText: "Challenge every aspect of your opponents. Sometimes a strong body hides a fragile psyche." —Ikora Rey

entries.name: Graviton Lance
entries.flavorText: Think of space-time as a tapestry on a loom. This weapon is the needle.

entries.name: Vigilance Wing
entries.flavorText: "The eye remains open. The Lighthouse remains lit." —Brother Vance

entries.name: Gunslinger
entries.flavorText: A lone wolf who lives for the perfect shot.

entries.name: Recurrent Impact
entries.flavorText: It's enough to drive someone out of their mind.

entries.name: Pathfinder's Visor
entries.flavorText: Clear mind and strong will serve as guides through the Ley Lines.

entries.name: Gouging Light
entries.flavorText: All told, I can't believe Holliday was able to put it back together. Not a lot left after a small-scale nuclear blast.

entries.name: Calamity Rig Robes
entries.flavorText: "When the ship goes down, you can't save it. You just gotta choose: go under, or swim." —The Drifter

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Grips
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We were forged in the fires of a burning world." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Stormchaser
entries.flavorText: Rage unseen.

entries.name: Dead Man's Tale
entries.flavorText: "Long, short, they all end the same way." —Katabasis

entries.name: The Messenger
entries.flavorText: The bearer of bad news.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Helm
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Heartshadow
entries.flavorText: Suffering to the conquered.

entries.name: Kairos Function Bond
entries.flavorText: "Some speculate that the radiolarian fluid is the last vestige of a biological life-form that became the Vex." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Exodus Down Cloak
entries.flavorText: This Guardian armor was repurposed from old Exodus Black crew flight suits.

entries.name: Shattered Warlock Bond
entries.flavorText: A shattered bond marks a broken promise.

entries.name: Praefectus Grips
entries.flavorText: "You want a ship? Surely your friends in the fleet would be happy to retrieve another lost Legionary. That is, unless, you'd rather not be found…" —The Spider

entries.name: Holdfast Cloak
entries.flavorText: Never let them see you break.

entries.name: The Fourth Mark
entries.flavorText: "Vengeance isn't a destination, friend. It's a commodity. Make sure you're willing to pay the price before you enter the deal." —The Spider

entries.name: Mark of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "What Calus found at the black edge… when he brings it to light, there will be a reckoning unlike anything this galaxy has ever seen." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: Scatterhorn Hood
entries.flavorText: "Since the Scatter, nowhere in the Reef felt like home. Before I knew it, I found myself on the Shore." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz

entries.name: Shayura's Wrath
entries.flavorText: "But here you are. This is truly a beginning…" —Shin Malphur

entries.name: Dawn Chimes Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who ring in new ages.

entries.name: Solstice Greaves (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Spark Redux mission, defeat enemies with Void melee abilities, and complete adventures.

entries.name: Lost Pacific Bond
entries.flavorText: Sloane had these Golden Age space suits repurposed for Guardian armor.

entries.name: Sins of the Past
entries.flavorText: What once was old shall be new again, and history will have its revenge.

entries.name: Eidolon Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts whose Guardians have no doubts to bind.

entries.name: Grips of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "There's something very settling about sleeping atop a pile of my own spent rounds." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Greaves
entries.flavorText: "I stopped counting the Armageddons." —The Drifter

entries.name: Hardy's Steps
entries.flavorText: "I can't tell any one of you what to do. I'm not that wise. Walk your path. You'll know it."

entries.name: Neoteric Kiyot Cloak
entries.flavorText: "I knew my name the instant my Ghost found me." —Therin Vai

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Strides
entries.flavorText: "What has been awoken can slumber no more." —Techeun Kalli

entries.name: Mask of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: The next time we meet.

entries.name: Helm of the Ace-Defiant
entries.flavorText: “The Sindu inhabited gas giants in the spinward marches. They refused my invitation at first. As with all things, they came to see things my way.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Multimach CCX
entries.flavorText: Friends are as companions on a journey who ought to aid each other to persevere.

entries.name: Equitis Shade Grips
entries.flavorText: "Ace pilots. Assassination squads. Swift thieves in the night. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Equitis Shade Cloak
entries.flavorText: "This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. They should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Calamity Rig Boots
entries.flavorText: "They say you can't run from what's coming. They obviously haven't seen old Drifter turn on the jets." —The Drifter

entries.name: Mask of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "I'm a Valus before I'm a 'Shadow.' But Calus is the empire's last, best hope. His plan is my plan." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: Lost Pacific Bond
entries.flavorText: Sloane had these Golden Age space suits repurposed for Guardian armor.

entries.name: Sleepless
entries.flavorText: "I see our path ahead, full of despair and hardship, and I will walk it with joy in my heart." —Sjur Eido

entries.name: Deep Explorer Bond
entries.flavorText: "Wasn't the exit this way?"  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition Log Final Transmission

entries.name: Calamity Rig Gloves
entries.flavorText: "The signs are always there, if you know what to look for. Most folks don't." —The Drifter

entries.name: Solstice Hood (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Nightfall Prestige at or above the bonus threshold.

entries.name: Exodus Down Mark
entries.flavorText: This Guardian armor was repurposed from old Exodus Black crew flight suits.

entries.name: Resonant Fury Greaves
entries.flavorText: Akka yearned for nurture. It did so through secrets.

entries.name: Opulent Stalker Vest
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen what must fall so the Empire may rise. Your mastery of silent slaughter shall make true Cabal of us all." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Shadow's Plate
entries.flavorText: "Nothing. Nothing can stop us. You and I shall uphold the pillars of existence until the end comes. And when it does…" —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Lorentz Driver
entries.flavorText: "Weapon system no longer explodes when trigger is pulled." —Prototype 7.2.1 Revision Notes

entries.name: Bond of the Emperor's Minister
entries.flavorText: For the Warlock possessed of Ghaul's wisdom.

entries.name: Shadow's Bond
entries.flavorText: “The Fulminator could directly afflict the nervous system of the organics around her. She was pain in all its shades. I will miss her.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Black Talon
entries.flavorText: "His life brought peace to the Reef. His death brings a sword." —Crows of the Black Hull

entries.name: Calamity Rig Mark
entries.flavorText: "Funny how nobody listens to doomsayers. They're the most honest folk I know." —The Drifter

entries.name: Sunbracers
entries.flavorText: "When one can wield the fire of stars, what use is flesh and bone?"

entries.name: Dunemarchers
entries.flavorText: Whether on solid rock or shifting sand dune, the inexorable Sand Eaters never slow their pace.

entries.name: Lion Rampant
entries.flavorText: All expect that you should rouse yourself, as did the former lions of your blood.

entries.name: Peacekeepers
entries.flavorText: Designed for the seamless delivery of justice in an unjust world.

entries.name: Solstice Strides (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Reach "Legend" Crucible Rank.

entries.name: BrayTech Sn0Mask
entries.flavorText: "This is our best work yet." —Project Manager, BrayTech R&D

entries.name: Deep Explorer Boots
entries.flavorText: "Psychometer says we're reaching dangerous levels of cognitive saturation here. We need to pull back."  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 4th Transmission

entries.name: Transfiguration
entries.flavorText: Desire becomes reality, o wishbringer mine.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Mark
entries.flavorText: "Had a face like the end-times and eyes like manna in the desert. One look at him, and I knew I wasn't gonna be saved." —The Drifter

entries.name: Warsat Shell
entries.flavorText: "We woke the Warmind and brought doom to the Iron Lords." —Valus Forge

entries.name: Calamity Rig Cover
entries.flavorText: "Always bet on the apocalypse. Best case, you're wrong. Worst case… at least your bag's packed." —The Drifter

entries.name: Pale Steed
entries.flavorText: "It's the thrill of the chase."

entries.name: Mark of Remembrance
entries.flavorText: To remind the flock that they are not forgotten.

entries.name: Kairos Function Wraps
entries.flavorText: "Vex structures on Venus and Mercury predate the Golden Age, and possibly Humanity itself." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Atavistic Idol Grips
entries.flavorText: "We believe she's also responsible for the dead Guardian and Eliksni we found on Venus. We haven't identified which dead Ghost belongs to the Guardian." —Vanguard Security Report Excerpt

entries.name: Resonant Fury Plate
entries.flavorText: Xol yearned for nurture. It did so amongst the thousands.

entries.name: Devil's Ruin
entries.flavorText: "Press on! The Devils will rue the day they came to our doors!" —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Boots of Ascendancy
entries.flavorText: "I've chosen my path. Can you say the same?" —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Helm
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Lightkin Strides
entries.flavorText: "I was asked if the City would protect the Traveler. I replied it is the Traveler who protects the City." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Mark of Nohr
entries.flavorText: "What Calus found at the black edge… when he brings it to light, there will be a reckoning unlike anything this galaxy has ever seen." —Valus Nohr

entries.name: Ketchkiller's Robes
entries.flavorText: "Sail quick so you don't get caught… and have a thick hull if you do." —Drifter

entries.name: Solstice Bond (Majestic)
entries.flavorText: Complete patrols on Titan, defeat combatants in the European Aerial Zone, and land Arc Super final blows on opposing Guardians in the Crucible or Gambit.

entries.name: Illicit Invader Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Titan?

entries.name: Outlawed Invader Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Titan?

entries.name: Notorious Invader Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you kill for him, Titan?

entries.name: Mask of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be cunning.

entries.name: Wing Theorem
entries.flavorText: The double-headed phoenix that fights itself represents Guardians who strengthen each other in the Crucible.

entries.name: Wraps of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "My stealth skin kept me secret. I just watched. To my dismay, the dead Light stood up. Shook himself off." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: The Jade Rabbit
entries.flavorText: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

entries.name: Karnstein Armlets
entries.flavorText: “You are mine, you shall be mine, you and I are one for ever.”

entries.name: Winter's Guile
entries.flavorText: "I know you." —Lord Felwinter

entries.name: Sola's Scar (Adept)
entries.flavorText: Digging leaves a mark.

entries.name: Tripwire Canary
entries.flavorText: "Luna is in danger." —SOC5 Team Leader

entries.name: Martyr's Retribution
entries.flavorText: That which returns from the void will always seek revenge.

entries.name: Boots of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: You're a difficult one to find.

entries.name: Boots of the Ace-Defiant
entries.flavorText: “We armed the Sindu with a fleet of golden ships. Their interceptors are a shield for the Leviathan, as the Shadows are my sword.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Solstice Grasps (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Payback Redux mission, defeat enemies with Void grenades, and complete Heroic strikes.

entries.name: A Swift Verdict
entries.flavorText: “Judgment is final.” —Emissary of the Nine

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Vest
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes it's a cosmic event. Sometimes it's a beast from hell. Sometimes it's one man." —The Drifter

entries.name: Hawkmoon
entries.flavorText: Stalk thy prey and let loose thy talons upon the Darkness.

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Greaves
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We crossed a burning world with sword in hand, bringing justice and blood." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Insigne Shade Bond
entries.flavorText: "This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. And they should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Lightkin Gloves
entries.flavorText: "I got no qualms with them shackin' up here, but you ask me, they're wild for lookin' up to that big ball in the sky again. Didn't end well the last time around. Fool me once and all that." —The Drifter

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes the difference between survival and eradication is just pure, simple stubbornness." —The Drifter

entries.name: Insigne Shade Bond
entries.flavorText: "This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. And they should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: The Right Choice
entries.flavorText: "And… thanks. You know. For being my Guardian."

entries.name: Helm of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be strategic.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Plate
entries.flavorText: "Was Wolf once. Still Wolf after Scatter, but… different. Then Queen's. Wolf again. Bannerless. Then Spider's." —Avrok

entries.name: Kairos Function Plate
entries.flavorText: "Multiple analyses confirm: the milky radiolarian fluid found in Vex chassis is organic in nature." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Armamentarium
entries.flavorText: For this, there is one remedy.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Bond
entries.flavorText: "Lost things have a way of washing up on the Tangled Shore." —The Spider

entries.name: Greaves of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be immovable.

entries.name: Plate of Transcendence
entries.flavorText: "The Vex can't stop us now. No one can."  —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Candescent Vest
entries.flavorText: Upgrade this item using Kindling and Embers obtained during Solstice 2022.

entries.name: Binary Phoenix Mark
entries.flavorText: The phoenix that fights itself, then rises from its ashes stronger than ever. That is the Crucible.

entries.name: I Am Alive
entries.flavorText: "When the end comes, I reserve the right to be last." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Wild Hunt Helm
entries.flavorText: Never lose focus.

entries.name: Gauntlets of Exaltation
entries.flavorText: "Did you see that? Do you see what I can do?" —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Voidwalker
entries.flavorText: From the smallest atoms bloom the greatest explosions.

entries.name: Grips of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be precise.

entries.name: Osteo Striga
entries.flavorText: "Victory is not in the unmaking of an enemy, but in the re-making of an enemy into your blade." —9th Understanding, 7th Revision of Sorrow

entries.name: Apotheosis Veil
entries.flavorText: Most helmets protect the mind from the universe. Not this one.

entries.name: The Colony
entries.flavorText: We outnumber you. We will find you. You are alone, and we are colony.

entries.name: Conspirator
entries.flavorText: Did Ghaul always dream of a republic? What terrible worm burrowed into his heart that he would betray my love and plot against me?

entries.name: Oxygen SR3
entries.flavorText: Fight on. You're still breathing.

entries.name: Illicit Collector Cloak
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you scrounge for him, Hunter?

entries.name: Solstice Helm (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Nightfall Prestige at or above the bonus threshold.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Gauntlets
entries.flavorText: "That's no ordinary dust. You're standing on the pulverized remnants of 1 Ceres." —Corsair Anzani Lyle

entries.name: One-Eyed Mask
entries.flavorText: An eye for an eye.

entries.name: Kairos Function Boots
entries.flavorText: "If the Vex had achieved what we would call 'time travel,' surely none of us would now exist." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Hood
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Scatterhorn Hood
entries.flavorText: "Since the Scatter, nowhere in the Reef felt like home. Before I knew it, I found myself on the Shore." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz

entries.name: Graviton Forfeit
entries.flavorText: "Doesn't matter how good you are—you stay out there too long, you're not coming back. Not the same way you left, anyway." —Tevis

entries.name: Solstice Gauntlets (Resplendent)
entries.flavorText: Complete strikes with at least one clanmate.

entries.name: Hyperborean Pinion
entries.flavorText: Soar together, under an eternal sun.

entries.name: Plate of Transcendence
entries.flavorText: "The Vex can't stop us now. No one can."  —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Dawnblade
entries.flavorText: Spread your wings and set the sky ablaze.

entries.name: Aeon Swift
entries.flavorText: "We are unique emanations of the same shared Light." —Cult of the Aeons

entries.name: Astrocyte Verse
entries.flavorText: The ideocosm contained within this helm transforms the wearer's head from flesh and/or exoneurons to the pure, raw stuff of thought.

entries.name: Tomb Rider
entries.flavorText: "Do the bandages… make it go faster?" —Ghost

entries.name: Cloak of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: My gift to the Hunter with Ghaul's cunning.

entries.name: Shadow's Cloak
entries.flavorText: “With the death of the Ace-Defiant, the Leviathan is without a master helmsman. If I must wait another millennium for a replacement, I shall.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Motion to Suppress
entries.flavorText: "Present your truths carefully."

entries.name: Mob Justice
entries.flavorText: Life offers few greater pleasures than to humiliate the venal aristocracy before a crowd. I am father to the people, and they shall adore me above all others.

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Mark
entries.flavorText: "We are what we survive. They will not be the Guardians." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: Wrong Side of Right
entries.flavorText: The right thing, for the wrong reasons.

entries.name: Phobos Warden Mark
entries.flavorText: "The Guardians will come through." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Xenos Vale Bond
entries.flavorText: New things are only strange until you behold them. Then they are even stranger.

entries.name: Wraps of Sekris
entries.flavorText: "My stealth skin kept me secret. I just watched. To my dismay, the dead Light stood up. Shook himself off." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

entries.name: Candescent Helm
entries.flavorText: Upgrade this item using Kindling and Embers obtained during Solstice 2022.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Helm
entries.flavorText: "Since the Scatter, nowhere in the Reef felt like home. Before I knew it, I found myself on the Shore." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz

entries.name: BrayTech Researcher's Bond
entries.flavorText: Keeping our greatest minds safe and warm.

entries.name: Solstice Mark (Magnificent)
entries.flavorText: Defeat the final boss in Altars of Sorrow.

entries.name: Thorn
entries.flavorText: "To rend one's enemies is to see them not as equals, but objects—hollow of spirit and meaning." —13th Understanding, 7th Book of Sorrow

entries.name: Lightkin Greaves
entries.flavorText: "Trust is built slowly, stone by stone. Like this City." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Precious Scars
entries.flavorText: "The Traveler has shown us that what was broken can be reformed, becoming better than it was before." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Robes
entries.flavorText: "Useless, that boy is. Nothing I altered in Alton's genetics paid off. Oh well. That's why I have three other grandchildren." —Clovis Bray I

entries.name: Crushing Helm (CODA)
entries.flavorText: A forceful skull: for one who seeks answers about the Dark.

entries.name: Phobos Warden Mask
entries.flavorText: "I'm fine. Begin the transmission."  —Commander Zavala

entries.name: BrayTech Thermal Grips
entries.flavorText: "You think this is cold? You have no idea."

entries.name: Opulent Scholar Robes
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen what must fall so the Empire may rise. Your mastery of knowledge apocryphal shall make true Cabal of us all." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Shadow's Cloak
entries.flavorText: “With the death of the Ace-Defiant, the Leviathan is without a master helmsman. If I must wait another millennium for a replacement, I shall.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Cloak of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: My gift to the Hunter with Ghaul's cunning.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Greaves
entries.flavorText: "The Awoken have been bleeding territories for years now. Tangled Shore was just the first to slip between the cracks." —The Spider

entries.name: Sol Pariah 6
entries.flavorText:
Amid the endless death one flew—unnatural all-consuming need—
And in the space between the two, accursed comprehension freed.

entries.name: The Conqueror 2
entries.flavorText:
To Tower comes a war in red; an orphan sounds the empire's call.
Mortal angels mourn the dead while lightless light wraps night in pall.

entries.name: Cinder Pinion Helm
entries.flavorText: "It's not enough to react! You must predict your opponent's next move if you hope to counter it." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: The Mountaintop
entries.flavorText: "In the heat of battle, Guardian, you will know the right choice to make." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Legacy's Oath Vest
entries.flavorText: "Every day is a recommitment to my path." —Elsie Bray

entries.name: Praefectus Helm
entries.flavorText: "The past is the past; we cannot return to it. All we can do now is fight for the future our people deserve, through blade and blood." —Valus Cau'tor

entries.name: Phobos Warden Cloak
entries.flavorText: "The Guardians will come through." —Commander Zavala

entries.name: Kairos Function Greaves
entries.flavorText: "If the Vex had achieved what we would call 'time travel,' surely none of us would now exist." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Grasps
entries.flavorText: "For starlight was my mother, and my father was the dark." —Queen Mara Sov

entries.name: Celestine Boots (Majestic)
entries.flavorText:
During Solstice 2021:
- Complete public events on Europa or Battlegrounds from Season of the Chosen.
- Collect Solar or Stasis Elemental Orbs in strike, Crucible, or Gambit playlists.
- Defeat combatants with melee attacks while using a Solar subclass.

entries.name: Zeroneiro Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who dream in digital.

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Grips
entries.flavorText: "I don't think any of us will be the same when this is over." —Crow

entries.name: Shadow's Grips
entries.flavorText: "With my knowledge of the future and all that you've seen and done… The silence borne of it… What can stop us at the end of all things?" —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Symmetry
entries.flavorText: "Duality is not a curse, but a gift." —Author unknown

entries.name: Notorious Sentry Robes
entries.flavorText: Courage. Your heart beats with courage.

entries.name: Cinder Pinion Greaves
entries.flavorText: "They can't kill what they can't catch. Take flight." —Lord Shaxx

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Mark
entries.flavorText: "Perhaps it was not the correct choice. But it was the right choice." —Yasmin Eld

entries.name: Sleeper Simulant
entries.flavorText: Subroutine IKELOS: Status=complete. MIDNIGHT EXIGENT: Status=still in progress.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Vest
entries.flavorText: "Was Wolf once. Still Wolf after Scatter, but… different. Then Queen's. Wolf again. Bannerless. Then Spider's." —Avrok

entries.name: Deep Explorer Mask
entries.flavorText: "Initial entry matches the Guardian's description, a… theater? Psychometer is picking up weird background noise here." —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 1st Transmission

entries.name: Outlawed Sentry Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you defend him, Warlock?

entries.name: Illicit Sentry Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you defend him, Warlock?

entries.name: Notorious Sentry Bond
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you defend him, Warlock?

entries.name: Chromatic Fire
entries.flavorText: "…found them… Crystal Orchards of Dione… requesting backup… coordinates to follow…" —Last transmission of Fireteam Pergamon

entries.name: Phoenix Protocol
entries.flavorText: Do not grieve the dying star. Its death kindles newer life, and thus the wheel turns again.

entries.name: Monte Carlo
entries.flavorText: There will always be paths to tread and methods to try. Roll with it.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Mask
entries.flavorText: "Since the Scatter, nowhere in the Reef felt like home. Before I knew it, I found myself on the Shore." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Plate
entries.flavorText: "There is a place where we can remember who we are." —Imogen Rife

entries.name: Gwisin Vest
entries.flavorText: "The Traveler called me back. Told me my work on this side isn't done yet." —Seong-Do Whiteclaw

entries.name: The Sixth Coyote
entries.flavorText: "You wanna use your old name, that's fine by me. Just don't tell anyone." —Micah-10 to Himura Shinobu

entries.name: Wild Hunt Mask
entries.flavorText: Be ever vigilant.

entries.name: Resonant Fury Vest
entries.flavorText: I feel the void, and through this experience, I learn that want is suffering.

entries.name: Techeun Force
entries.flavorText: Sworn into faithful service to the Queen, the Techeuns of the Reef have long protected the secrets of the Awoken.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Helm
entries.flavorText: "I've learned not to be ashamed of the fear. It's to be expected, given what we are." —Pavel Nolg

entries.name: Divinity
entries.flavorText: Calibrate reality. Seek inevitability. Embody divinity.

entries.name: Opulent Duelist Mark
entries.flavorText: "I have foreseen the end of all things. The novenary, the Awoken Queen, the sad, strange little man on his rickety boat. They believe they've seen the same. What they don't know will destroy them." —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Lost Pacific Cape
entries.flavorText: Sloane had these Golden Age space suits repurposed for Guardian armor.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Plate
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes it's a cosmic event. Sometimes it's a beast from hell. Sometimes it's one man." —The Drifter

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Vest
entries.flavorText: Surrounded by shadows.

entries.name: Gallant Ward Shell
entries.flavorText: For Ghosts who guard the wall.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Gloves
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes the difference between survival and eradication is just pure, simple stubbornness." —The Drifter

entries.name: Brave Titan's Mark
entries.flavorText: A Mark meant to honor the stalwart defenders of the Last City.

entries.name: Resonant Fury Cloak
entries.flavorText: I wear the void, and through this empathy, I learn that only my will endures.

entries.name: Hard Light
entries.flavorText: Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.

entries.name: Lightkin Helm
entries.flavorText: "Even below this night, the ground has been warmed by the Great Machine." —Mithrax

entries.name: Turris Shade Plate
entries.flavorText: A little stronger. A more powerful stance. You are almost ready… to cast a Shadow. —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Lunafaction Boots
entries.flavorText: "I thank you for the gift of these atoms. I will use them well." —The Stoic

entries.name: Illicit Sentry Mark
entries.flavorText: When the end comes… Will you defend him, Titan?

entries.name: Mihaylova's Choice
entries.flavorText: "Good, bad… we walk around looking like everyone else."

entries.name: Solstice Helm (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the Chosen Redux mission, defeat enemies with Solar Supers, and complete a Nightfall.

entries.name: Tusked Allegiance Vest
entries.flavorText: "If they're truly worthy, if it's something they deserve, let them prove it." —Crow

entries.name: Kairos Function Greaves
entries.flavorText: "If the Vex had achieved what we would call 'time travel,' surely none of us would now exist." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Traveler's Judgment 5
entries.flavorText:
A visitor ignites the sky, and in the truth of light it dreams:
Above the dead and yet-to-die, a legion's blade with fire screams.

entries.name: Turris Shade Greaves
entries.flavorText: "There has only ever been but a single Shadow from each people I've encountered. Yet there are so many Lights, and I have so little time…" —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal.

entries.name: Shadow's Greaves
entries.flavorText: "…The future can't be fought. I know it. You know it. But that won't stop you from trying."  —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Pyrrhic Ascent Hood
entries.flavorText: "I see with eyes unclouded." —Shayura, Awoken Warlock

entries.name: Liar's Handshake
entries.flavorText: Look 'em in the eye.

entries.name: Scatterhorn Robe
entries.flavorText: "Was Wolf once. Still Wolf after Scatter, but… different. Then Queen's. Wolf again. Bannerless. Then Spider's." —Avrok

entries.name: Vest of Transcendence
entries.flavorText: "If you do this, it can't be undone. Some choices change you. This is one of them." —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

entries.name: Kairos Function Helm
entries.flavorText: "Future War Cult has an artifact they call 'The Device' which may be Vex in origin." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Adored
entries.flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Spider's eclectic tastes.

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Robes
entries.flavorText: "Sometimes it's a cosmic event. Sometimes it's a beast from hell. Sometimes it's one man." —The Drifter

entries.name: Merciless
entries.flavorText: Entropy is inevitable.

entries.name: Flowing Grips (CODA)
entries.flavorText: A mercurial limb: for one who seeks answers about the Dark.

entries.name: Zephyr
entries.flavorText: In the cold of winter, we remember that the warm west wind will blow again.

entries.name: Vanguard Dare Cloak
entries.flavorText: Course you gotta jack their stuff. That's how you show 'em you love 'em, Andal. Now lemme show you around. —Tallulah "Tallu" Fairwind

entries.name: BrayTech Sn0Treads
entries.flavorText: "Piecing together complex systems of causalities is the puzzle that defined me." —Elsie Bray

entries.name: Takanome Wings
entries.flavorText: "Follow the blue flowers to the City. And know that even if the planter is dead, they still watch over you." —Ayane Takanome

entries.name: Blacklight Razor
entries.flavorText: Mounted with harmonized twin pulse engines for a blazing attack.

entries.name: Gray Hornet
entries.flavorText: This Sparrow zips and dives and comes in for the sting.

entries.name: Insigne Shade Robes
entries.flavorText: A little bolder. A little more focus. You are almost ready… to cast a Shadow. —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Helm of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be strategic.

entries.name: G-335 Anseris Overdrive
entries.flavorText: A lost artifact of the Golden Age.

entries.name: Seventh Seraph Vest
entries.flavorText: Bereft of guidance and sanctuary.

entries.name: Boots of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "The Clipse worship guns. That's why Rull and I have an understanding. Even if he's not bright." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer

entries.name: Hardy's Journey
entries.flavorText: "Listen closely to those deep, distant warnings you feel."

entries.name: D.F.A.
entries.flavorText: "Osiris said that he started to pity the Red Legion, getting trapped in here for infinite eternities. I think they're getting exactly what they deserve." —Sagira

entries.name: Kairos Function Boots
entries.flavorText: "If the Vex had achieved what we would call 'time travel,' surely none of us would now exist." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Vest of Feltroc
entries.flavorText: "The Loyalists won't be ready until every world in this system casts a Shadow. Calus will get us there." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer

entries.name: Robes of the Great Hunt
entries.flavorText: I wish to be ruthless.

entries.name: Comrades in Arms
entries.flavorText: None of us can do it alone. And none of us should want to.

entries.name: Solstice Plate (Rekindled)
entries.flavorText: Complete the 1AU Redux mission, defeat enemies with Arc grenades, and win non-private Crucible matches.

entries.name: Equitis Shade Cloak
entries.flavorText: "This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. They should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

entries.name: Boots of the Ace-Defiant
entries.flavorText: “We armed the Sindu with a fleet of golden ships. Their interceptors are a shield for the Leviathan, as the Shadows are my sword.” —Emperor Calus

entries.name: Boots of the Emperor's Agent
entries.flavorText: You're a difficult one to find.

entries.name: Kairos Function Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Some speculate that the radiolarian fluid is the last vestige of a biological life-form that became the Vex." —Sister Faora, "Theories on the Vex"

entries.name: Charge of Light
entries.flavorText: Boldly into the jaws of death.

entries.name: The Hothead
entries.flavorText: Think of it as a weaponized temper tantrum.

entries.name: Skyburner's Oath
entries.flavorText: The inscription, written in a Cabal dialect, reads: "Victory or death!"

entries.name: Empty Vessel
entries.flavorText: "It's versatile. By itself, it's nothing, just an empty tube. But that's its deceptive beauty; it's all about what you fill it with. What you make it. What you make it do." —Banshee-44

entries.name: Ancient Apocalypse Hood
entries.flavorText: "Maybe you leave your first apocalypse. But your second one never leaves you." —The Drifter

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Mark
entries.flavorText: Let him find what he needs.

entries.name: Resonant Fury Helm
entries.flavorText: Ur yearns for nurture. It does so through hunger.

entries.name: Reverie Dawn Greaves
entries.flavorText: "What has been awoken can slumber no more." —Techeun Kalli

entries.name: Iron Forerunner Cloak
entries.flavorText: "Some know the legend. We crushed the Warlords beneath our heel so that they may never rise again." —Lord Saladin

entries.name: BrayTech Sn0Boots
entries.flavorText: "Nonslip techno treads for maximum arctic mobility."

entries.name: Binary Phoenix Bond
entries.flavorText: The phoenix that fights itself, then rises from its ashes stronger than ever. That is the Crucible.

entries.name: Warmind's Avatar Legplates
entries.flavorText: Searching for here and now.

entries.name: Hushed Syrinx
entries.flavorText: "I'm glad you're staying."

entries.name: Young Ahamkara's Spine
entries.flavorText: Give me your arm, oh bearer mine. Let me help you fill the world with teeth.

entries.name: Mechaneer's Tricksleeves
entries.flavorText: "This won't end well for one of us. And darling, it won't be me." —Self-styled "Lady" Olu Alderdice

entries.name: Ego Talon Bond
entries.flavorText: "You will find the nightmares grow worse. Thankfully, you no longer have need of sleep." —Gallida Tuyet

entries.name: Calamity Rig Bond
entries.flavorText: "Funny how nobody listens to doomsayers. They're the most honest folk I know." —The Drifter

entries.name: The Emperor's Envy
entries.flavorText: The son's ambition will be his undoing.

entries.name: Deep Explorer Vest
entries.flavorText: "Found a hallway, full of statues of Calus in various states of dissection. Sobbing noise coming from the walls."  —Hidden Mindscape Expedition 3rd Transmission

entries.name: Vex Mythoclast
entries.flavorText: …a causal loop within the weapon's mechanism, suggesting that the firing process somehow binds space and time into…

entries.name: Quicksilver Storm
entries.flavorText: Three words. Carved by hand: Affinity. Altruism. Awareness.
